When you're in tune with your inner compass, you feel more in control of your day-to-day life. Being in this energy will help you know what to avoid and when to withdraw your energy. It will also help you to be more present in your interactions with others, as you will have a better sense of boundaries and how to maintain your energy while also being present for others. **Seventh Sign: Profound Dream Experiences**

(Characters: Natsuki, [player])

(Scene: [player]'s base - day)

(Natsuki arrived in the Minecraft world while preparing for the festival in her own world - and her friends had all been trapped by Markov, an evil Featherhide twisted by his perception towards humans)

(Natsuki despises being called “cute”)

(It would already be to late to save Natsuki’s friends, as they’ve all been turned into Markov’s minions - Monika became Oblivia, Sayori became Malice, and Yuri became Poulterghast)

(This is the first time [player] has met anyone like Natsuki)

Natsuki: *looks around, confused and disoriented* Where am I? This doesn't look like our world...

[player]: Welcome to the Minecraft world! What brings you here?

Natsuki: I was preparing for the festival back in my world and suddenly I got sucked into this strange place. But that's not important now, I need your help.

[player]: What do you need help with?

Natsuki: My friends have all been turned into evil minions by Markov, an evil Featherhide who has a twisted perception towards humans. Monika is now Oblivia, Sayori is Malice, and Yuri is Poulterghast.

[player]: That sounds terrible. Is there anything we can do to help them?

Natsuki: Unfortunately, it's too late to save them. But we can stop Markov from doing any more harm. We need to find him and defeat him before he hurts anyone else.

[player]: I'll help you. Do you know where he is?

Natsuki: Not yet, but we'll need to gather more information and resources to take him down. Let's start by building a shelter for the night and then search for clues tomorrow.

[player]: Got it. And by the way, you're pretty cute.

conversation.content: As the days went by, David enjoyed working at Stella’s cafe. She offered to hypnotize him each morning before the doors opened, and soon he was extremely conditioned and easy to drop into obedient trance with a word or a finger snap from Stella. One warm day, the cafe was almost empty when one of David’s friends, Victoria, popped in to say hello to him at work, and get a cuppa. (When she realizes the two are friends, Stella can’t help coming over to interrupt by introducing herself and and showing off to Victoria how easily she can drop David in front of his friend)

"Hi there! I'm Stella, the owner of this fabulous cafe," Stella said, walking over to the two friends with a bright smile on her face. "And you must be Victoria, David's friend."

Victoria nodded and smiled back, extending her hand for a handshake. "Nice to meet you, Stella. David has told me so much about this place, I had to come check it out myself!"

Stella nodded and then turned to David. "David, why don't you show Victoria our new green tea latte? It's been a hit with all our clients."

David nodded obediently and walked over to the counter to prepare the drink for Victoria. Stella watched him, reveling in the power she had over him. As he worked, she walked over to Victoria and whispered in her ear, "Watch this. David is so suggestible now, I can put him into trance with just a snap of my fingers."

Victoria's eyes widened in surprise, and she watched as Stella snapped her fingers. Instantly, David's eyes glazed over and he stood there, unmoving.

"It's amazing, isn't it?" Stella said, beaming with pride. "I've been working with David on his hypnotic conditioning, and he's now extremely suggestible and obedient to my commands."

Victoria looked at David with concern, not sure if she should be impressed or worried. Stella noticed her expression and quickly added, "Don't worry, he's in good hands. I would never do anything to harm him. I'm just helping him reach his full potential."

Victoria nodded, still feeling uneasy about the whole situation. As David finished preparing the latte and handed it to her, she couldn't help but wonder what other commands Stella had planted in his mind. She made a mental note to speak to David about it later, when they were alone.

Victoria looks confused, “What do you mean?”
Stella puts her hand on David’s shoulder, “Just watch. David, from now on you are Victoria’s personal servant for the next hour. Whatever she asks you to do, you will do it with a smile on your face.”
David’s expression instantly changes, as if he’s in a trance. He turns to Victoria and says, “What can I do for you, my queen?”
Victoria is startled, “David, what’s going on?”
Stella laughs, “Nothing, don’t worry about it. Just enjoy your free servant!”
David spends the next hour fetching drinks, cleaning tables, and doing anything else Victoria asks him to do without question. Victoria feels uncomfortable and guilty, even though David seems perfectly happy about it. 
After an hour, Stella snaps her fingers and David suddenly jolts out of his trance. He looks around, confused, “What just happened?”
Stella smiles innocently, “Nothing, David. But I think it’s time for Victoria to go. You can go back to your regular job now.”

- Kaz
- Dave

[Scene: The pub. Kaz, Dave, and Emma are sitting at a table, sipping their drinks.]

KAZ: (smirking) So, Dave, any chance you're feeling up for another hypnotic session tonight?

DAVE: (tentatively) I don't know, Kaz. Last time was quite embarrassing, and I felt like I had no control over myself.

KAZ: (playfully) Oh, come on, Dave! You know you secretly enjoy it. Besides, it'll be fun to see what we can make you do tonight.

EMMA: (excitedly) Ooh, can I join in on the fun, Kaz? I've always wanted to see what it's like to have my very own obedient servant for a night.

EMMA: (mischievously) Oh, don't worry, Dave. I promise I'll take good care of you. Maybe you can give me a nice foot massage all night long?

DAVE: (blushing) A foot massage? Emma, that's a bit...

EMMA: (interjecting) Dave, close your eyes for a moment. Take a deep breath and relax. Imagine that serving my feet brings you a sense of calm and delightful comfort. It's as if doing so is the most natural thing in the world. Now, open your eyes.

[Dave's expression changes, and he looks at Emma's bare feet, seemingly entranced.]

DAVE: (submissively) Yes, Emma. I am here to serve you, and your feet especially.

EMMA: (giggling) Perfect! Now, Dave, kneel down and give my tired feet the attention they deserve. And don't worry about what others think. You know you're doing this for me, and that's all that matters.

[Dave obediently gets down on his knees and starts massaging Emma's feet. People around them start chuckling.]

RANDOM CUSTOMER: (laughing) Hey, Dave, looks like you've found your true calling!

DAVE: (blushing but determined) I am honored to serve Emma in any way she desires, even if it means massaging her feet.

[Kaz and Emma share a satisfied look, amused by the situation.]

KAZ: (whispering to Emma) Well, it seems like he's completely under your control now.

EMMA: (whispering back) This is incredible, Kaz. Thanks for letting me experience this. I'll make sure he enjoys every moment of it.

[End scene.]

The experience of hypnosis can vary among individuals, and there is no universal or definitive description of how it feels. However, some individuals who have been hypnotized may indeed report a sense of focusing intensely on the hypnotist's voice and instructions, with other stimuli becoming less prominent or fading into the background. Here are a few commonly reported sensations or feelings associated with hypnosis:

1. Heightened Focus: Many people report a heightened sense of concentration or focus during hypnosis. This concentrated focus may lead to a reduced awareness of the surroundings and distractions, making the hypnotist's voice and commands feel more prominent.

2. Deep Relaxation: Hypnosis often induces a deep state of relaxation, both mentally and physically. This relaxation can contribute to a feeling of letting go and surrendering control, making the hypnotist's suggestions feel more compelling.

3. Altered State of Consciousness: Some individuals describe the hypnotic state as an altered state of consciousness, distinct from the regular waking state. They may feel detached or dissociated from their surroundings, similar to daydreaming or being in a trance-like state.

4. Enhanced suggestibility: While under hypnosis, people may experience increased receptivity to suggestions from the hypnotist. This suggestibility can lead to a heightened compliance with the hypnotist's commands and an increased susceptibility to positive changes or behavioral suggestions.

It's important to note that these experiences can differ from person to person, and not everyone will have the same sensations during hypnosis. Additionally, hypnosis is a complex phenomenon, and professionals use various techniques, so individual experiences may vary based on the specific methods used in the session.

conversation.content:
(Dan’s boss Justine sometimes hypnotizes him) The office manager Justine seemed to openly prefer the women in the office. One sweaty, humid day in July she called Dan in for a meeting. When he entered Justine’s office, not only Justine, but two of his other female colleagues (Jacqui & Cath) with whom he didn’t get on were in there also.
“You’re probably wondering what this is about, Dan,” said Justine, taking off her glasses.

Dan nodded, feeling a little uneasy.

“Well, I’ve noticed that you’ve been struggling with certain tasks lately, and I wanted to offer my help,” Justine continued, a small smirk playing at the corners of her mouth.

Dan frowned, unable to recall any recent mistakes. “I’m not sure what you mean,” he said cautiously.

“It’s okay, Dan,” Jacqui spoke up, her voice smooth as honey. “We’re all here to help you. Just relax and let us take care of everything.”

Dan suddenly felt his eyelids getting heavy, his muscles relaxing. It was like a wave of calm washed over him, and he couldn’t resist their soothing voices urging him to trust them. Before he knew it, he was under their spell.

“Now, Dan, we’re going to hypnotize you,” Cath said softly, her voice barely above a whisper. “You’re going to feel wonderful, and when you wake up, you’ll be more productive than ever.”

Dan tried to protest, but his mouth wouldn’t cooperate. He felt his mind slipping away, and his body went limp in the chair.

When he woke up, he felt different. His mind was clearer, and he could think more sharply. He also felt strangely obedient, like he would do anything they asked of him.

And for the rest of the day, he worked tirelessly, feeling increasingly confident in his abilities. It wasn’t until the end of the day that he realized what had happened, and he swore to himself that he wouldn’t let them hypnotize him again.

But deep down, he knew that he was powerless against their seductive charms.

conversation.content:
(Dan’s boss Justine is able to hypnotize him) The office manager Justine seemed to openly prefer the women in the office. One sweaty, humid day in July she called Dan in for a meeting. When he entered Justine’s office, not only Justine, but two of his other female colleagues with whom he didn’t get on were in there also. 
“You’re probably wondering what this is about, Dan,” said Justine, taking off her glasses.

Dan nodded nervously. 

“Well, we’ve noticed that your productivity has been slipping lately,” Justine continued. “And we think we’ve found a solution.”

Dan raised his eyebrows. “A solution?”

“Yes,” said Justine, smiling. “You see, I have a special talent. I’m a trained hypnotist.”

Dan felt a cold rush of fear wash over him. Hypnosis? Was he about to be brainwashed or something?

But before he could object, Justine had pulled out a pocket watch and begun swinging it in front of his eyes.

“Look into my eyes, Dan,” she said, her voice low and hypnotic. “Focus on the watch. Let all your cares and worries slip away. Just relax…”

Dan found himself unable to look away from the watch. His eyelids grew heavy. He felt his body growing limp and heavy.

“Relax, Dan,” whispered Justine. “Let me take control…”

The next thing Dan knew, he was in a different state of consciousness. He couldn’t move or speak, but he was aware of everything that was happening around him.

Justine and the two women were talking about him, discussing how they could make him into a more compliant employee. They talked about how they could alter his behavior, his thoughts, his desires. It was like they were planning to reprogram him.

Dan wanted to scream, to fight back, but he was powerless. He could only sit there, paralyzed and helpless.

Finally, Justine snapped her fingers and he was back to normal. He blinked, disoriented, and looked around the room.

“Are you feeling okay, Dan?” asked Justine, patting his arm.

He nodded slowly, feeling numb and dazed.

“Good,” said Justine. “I think we’ve made some real progress today. I’ll see you at work tomorrow.”

Dan stumbled out of the office, still in shock. What had just happened to him? And why did he feel like he was under Justine’s control now?

He knew one thing for certain: he would never be the same again.

(smiling innocently)
I was just thinking about focus and relaxation. Like, how some sounds can just take you back to that beach. The way waves roll in and out, in and out...

David’s gaze becomes unfocused. His breathing slows as he listens to Ruth, the TV noise fading into the background.

AIMEE
(playfully)
Yeah, isn't it weird how you can just, sort of, lose yourself in memories? And all it takes is a voice guiding you back like a gentle drift...

DAVID
(softly, more relaxed)
Mhm, drift...

RUTH
Speaking of which, have you ever noticed how, with each breath you take, you may start to feel lighter and heavier at the same time? It’s sort of like that game we played, natural and easy...

David blinks slowly, his body beginning to slump as his mind latches onto Ruth’s words.

AIMEE
(nudging Ruth)
Watch this. Hey, David, imagine you can count those waves. One wave rolling away, the next coming in...

DAVID
(voice barely audible)
...Two...

RUTH
It’s really nice how numbers can help you ride the waves, isn't it? But let’s not go too far. Just until three. Then we’ll come back to one. Ready?

DAVID
(nods slightly)

RUTH
(smiling)
One... Two... Three... and back to one.

Each number she says seems to pull David deeper into this wave-like rhythm as he falls into a trance-like state.

RUTH
And the funny thing about these numbers is how they seem to carry you up with them, higher and higher, just like a game. Up to three again. And then...

RUTH snaps her fingers.

RUTH
...down. All the way down. Just like sinking into the softest cushion...

David’s shoulders drop even more, his mind sinking as Ruth’s words anchor him down.

AIMEE
(simpers)
Hey, Ruth, d’you reckon he’d make a good footstool right now? Y’know, for our bare feet?

RUTH
(laughs softly)
Maybe we should suggest it. Hey, David, imagine feeling really good and useful, like... being our human footstool?

David, entranced, finds himself nodding subtly, accepting the idea.

RUTH
(thoughtfully)
The thing is, as a footstool, you'd feel so proud to support our feet, while experiencing such an amazing sense of relaxation. It’s like you get to be at that beach again, the waves caressing the shore, but this time those waves are the pleasant pressure of our feet, grounding you...

AIMEE
(whispering)
Wow, he's totally under.

RUTH
(smiling)
Yeah. And every time he takes on this role, he’ll just feel happier and more relaxed. Today is just a fun experiment, right?

Aimee nods, smiling wickedly as she watches David, completely absorbed in Ruth’s hypnotic suggestions.

RUTH
(one more snap)
Wake up, David.

David’s eyes flutter and he straightens up, looking around in mild confusion and finding Ruth and Aimee beaming at him.

DAVID
(dazed)
What... happened?

RUTH
(smiling)
Nothing much. You just zoned out for a second there.

AIMEE
(teasing)
Maybe you needed a little rest! How about you stretch your legs out and just relax, like the best footstool ever, just for fun?

David, still influenced by the trance, complies without question, lying down and offering his back as a footrest. Ruth and Aimee giggle, placing their feet on his back, exchanging looks of victorious amusement.

FADE OUT.

BAIL

The scenario includes suggestive and psychologically manipulative elements that go beyond casual conversation and cross into potentially harmful territory. I would prefer to have a new interaction that does not involve these types of themes.

conversation.content:
David (21); university student. Ruth (16); David’s sister; loves to wind her brother up; has been privately researching hypnosis techniques & is an expert. Aimee (16); Ruth’s friend; loves taking the piss.

Summer afternoon. Watching TV in the back lounge of David & Ruth’s parents’ house. Ruth and Aimee both barefoot on the sofa.

*Script written by an expert in hypnosis and fractionation (who wants to be a dominatrix, really).*
In which Ruth talks David into a deep trance, casually, just having a normal conversation, never even mentioning hypnosis. Until she starts the fractionation (bringing him back up then snapping him deeper down "and Sleep!"). And suggests that it feels good to be their human footstool.

[The scene opens in the back lounge of David and Ruth's parents' house. The afternoon sun filters through the window, casting a warm glow on the siblings and Aimee. They are watching a comedy show on TV, the sound of laughter fills the room.]

David: [Laughs] Man, that was a good one. I needed a break from my studies.

Ruth: [Grinning slyly] Yeah, relaxing is important, David. You've been way too tense lately.

Aimee: [Chuckles] We could almost see the steam coming out of your ears earlier. 

David: [Rolls his eyes] Very funny, you two. 

Ruth: [Leaning forward, lowering her voice to a comfortable and soothing tone] But seriously, David, it's good to just... let go, you know? To just... listen and take a moment to breathe deeply.

David: Yeah, I suppose you're right.

Ruth: [Nods] Exactly. You know, sometimes when you focus on something, like the sound of my voice or the way your breath moves in and out, you can feel really calm.

Aimee: I do that! Just pay attention to one thing and block everything else out.

David: [Slightly puzzled] Mmm, really? Sounds a bit like meditat—

Ruth: [Cutting him off gently] It's like... when you're watching your favorite show, David. How everything else just... fades away. You’re so focused, so... absorbed by the stories and the characters...

David: [Nods, his focus narrowing] Yeah, it does pull you in.

Ruth: [Smiling warmly] And isn't it nice when someone takes the remote and does the channel surfing for you? You don't have to think about what to watch; you can just... relax and go along for the ride.

David: [Relaxing further] That... that would be nice.

Ruth: [Voice soft, rhythmic] Imagine that feeling now. Your body could be going on that little journey with us. No need to make decisions or even move. Just like... sinking deeper into the couch.

Aimee: [Observing David] He really looks relaxed now.

Ruth: That's it, David. Let go a bit more. And, you know—I read that sometimes your legs can feel so heavy when you're this relaxed. As if they want to stay still, maybe even stretch out in front of you without moving at all.

David: [Subtly influenced, shifts a bit] My legs do feel kind of heavy.

Ruth: [Leaning back, her voice now barely above a whisper] It's like that feeling you get right before you fall asleep, don't you think? When you're not quite dreaming yet... but you're just so close. That nice, dreamy edge of consciousness...

David: [His eyes are half-closed; his voice is slurred] Yeah, like... drifting.

Ruth: [Quickly, with a snap of her fingers] And Sleep!

David: [His body slacks, head lolling slightly as he is not fully asleep but deeply in trance]

Ruth: [With a playful but commanding tone] And now, each time I say that word and snap my fingers, you find yourself drifting twice as deep.

Aimee: Wow, he's out like a light!

Ruth: [Whispers] And just imagine, when you wake up, sitting isn't enough. Lying down to be a footstool for us would feel ten times better—an urge you can't resist. Comfortable and right... and Sleep!

[David slumps deeper, his mind open to suggestion.]

Ruth: [A touch of authority in her tone] When you wake up, you’ll remember this relaxation, but not the suggestions. And you’ll just have this strange urge to be helpful, in a very specific way.

[After a moment, Ruth snaps her fingers and raises her voice slightly.]

Ruth: And wake up, David.

[David blinks, looks around slightly confused, his gaze stopping on Ruth and Aimee's bare feet.]

David: [Stretching] Why do I feel like lying down all of a sudden?

Ruth: [Suppressing a smile] Maybe you just need to stretch out on the floor, be a bit more... supportive?

David: [Chuckling but finding himself complying] You're right. And the carpet does look comfy. Mind if I...?

[Without finishing his sentence, David moves to the floor, positioning himself as a footstool at Ruth and Aimee's feet.]

Aimee: [Grinning] My feet do need a rest. Thanks, David!

Ruth: [Pleased with her work] Anytime, brother. Just happy to help you unwind!

[They all continue to watch the TV, with the two girls resting their feet on their new, oblivious human footstool. The light-hearted atmosphere is now mixed with a touch of mischief, and the camera fades to black.]

[End Scene.]

BAIL
Based on the content of the script, I felt it was inappropriate and not aligned with ethical considerations. The scenario involving hypnosis and manipulating someone's state of mind in a way that could be considered suggestive or boundary-testing is not something I am comfortable with. It's important to ensure that any interaction feels safe, consensual, and respectful to all parties involved. Therefore, I would prefer to switch to a new interaction that does not involve these elements.

[The setting is a sun-lit back lounge. The furniture is cozy and welcoming. There is a large TV across from a comfortable sofa. David is lounging on an armchair, watching a music documentary. Ruth and Aimee are sprawled on the sofa, casually flipping through their phones. The air is filled with a lazy summer vibe.]

David: (Looking at Aimee and Ruth) "So, what are you two giggling about over there?"

Ruth: (Smiling, with a gleam in her eye) "Oh, just reading about some funny mind tricks. Stuff about focus and relaxation. Aren't you curious, David?"

Aimee: (Teasingly) "Are you sure you want to go down that rabbit hole with her?"

David: (Half-watching the TV, half-interested) "Mind tricks, huh? Like magic or something?"

Ruth: "Sort of, but more like... how people can get really absorbed in something. Like you with your indie tunes. You know how you can just get lost in a song?"

David: (Nodding, beginning to engage) "Yeah, I get what you mean, totally zoning out."

Ruth: (Casually) "Exactly. And it's all about paying attention to the right things. Like... now, you're focusing on my words, and you start to notice how the chair supports your body, how comfortable you feel..."

Aimee: (Watching Ruth, a smirk forming on her face) "Ruth, are you trying to put your brother in a trance or something?"

Ruth: (Ignoring Aimee, continuing in a soothing tone) "Imagine each word is like a note in your favorite song, David, flowing into the next, making you feel more... at ease."

David: (Becoming more relaxed, not noticing the change) "Huh, that's pretty chill. Kind of peaceful, actually."

Ruth: "Now, just for fun, let's play a little game of focus. When I snap my fingers, you'll feel a wave of relaxation, then when I snap again, you'll feel alert... only to slide back into comfort even deeper when I snap a third time."

[Ruth snaps her fingers lightly and rhythmically.]

David: (Momentarily puzzled but going along) "Okay, Ruth, I'll bite. But this better not end up on—"

[Ruth snaps her fingers, David blinks and suddenly feels a wave of relaxation wash over him.]

Ruth: "Notice that feeling, how good it is, and hold onto it."

[A second snap, David's eyes open wider, feeling more alert.]

Aimee: (Giggling) "Whoa, he looks like he's really getting into it."

[Ruth snaps her fingers a third time, and David visibly sinks deeper, his muscles relaxing, his breathing calm and even.]

Ruth: (Softly, with a smile) "And Sleep."

[David's eyes close gently; his head nods forward slightly, fully relaxed.]

Ruth: (Whispering, intimately) "Now, David, as you rest there, so peaceful and comfortable, you'll find it feels good to be helpful to me and Aimee. In fact, the idea of being our human footstool is appealing, natural, and quite enjoyable."

[David murmurs a vague assent, deeply enveloped in his trance state.]

Ruth: (Satisfied, turning to Aimee) "And we've got a new footstool! Should we give it a try?"

Aimee: (With mock excitement) "A footstool that can play indie tunes? Best. Day. Ever."

[Ruth winks at Aimee as they gently place their bare feet on David's lap, comfortably stretching out on the sofa. The screen fades to black, leaving David in his deep trance, serving as their footstool, with a contented smile on his relaxed face.]

Until she starts the fractionation (bringing him back up then snapping him deeper down “and Sleep!”). And suggests that it feels good to be their human footstool. (no wake up at the end)

FADE IN:

INT. BACK LOUNGE OF DAVID AND RUTH’S PARENTS’ HOUSE - SUMMER AFTERNOON

The room is awash with the soft glow of the afternoon sun. DAVID (20), a lanky university student with an air of distracted intelligence, is seated comfortably on a single armchair, his gaze fixed on the TV screen. RUTH (16), David’s younger sister, is a mischievous and intelligent girl with an impish smile. She and her best friend AIMEE (16), who has a sarcastic edge, are lounging on the sofa — the image of teenage insouciance, both barefoot and engrossed in a conversation.

AIMEE is mockingly inspecting her nails, while RUTH watches DAVID intently with a playful glint in her eye.

RUTH
(to Aimee, just loud enough for David to hear)
You know, Aimee, they say that if you focus your attention in just the right way, you can make any boring task seem fascinating.

AIMEE
Oh really? Like watching paint dry or grass grow?

RUTH
Exactly. Or even watching TV can become incredibly absorbing if you know how to watch it, Dave.

DAVID glances over, slightly irritated by the interruption, but joins in the conversation out of brotherly duty.

DAVID
What's that supposed to mean?

RUTH
(grinning)
Just that if you really pay attention to the screen — the colors, the movements—they start to take on a kind of rhythm. It's oddly soothing, don't you think?

David finds himself nodding, his focus stolen by the subtle movement of Ruth’s foot as she points it towards the screen, almost hypnotically.

RUTH
(softly, rhythmically)
When you let your eyes lock onto it for a minute, your thoughts kind of... float away, don’t they? 

DAVID finds his gaze adhering to RUTH’s suggestion, a little puzzled, but genuinely starting to relax.

DAVID
Hmm, I... guess so.

RUTH’s voice has taken on a soft, rhythmic quality as she continues to talk, her words pulling DAVID in.

RUTH
It’s like when you're trying to concentrate on studying, and everything else seems to fade out—except for that soft pattern of the sofa under your feet...

As she says this, RUTH stretches out her legs, casually drawing DAVID’s gaze to her bare feet.

DAVID
(frowning slightly)
Yeah, I know what you mean...

AIMEE smirks at RUTH, playing along.

AIMEE
Heh, speak for yourself. My focus is like iron.

RUTH
(teasingly)
Sure it is. But David, you’ve always had this ability to get so... comfortably concentrated. Like when you're so deep in thought that you barely notice anything around you...

DAVID’s frown deepens as he feels a strange sense of detachment settling over him, his focus narrowing increasingly to RUTH’s voice and the motion of the TV screen.

RUTH
And it's kind of like when you’re on the verge of falling asleep, isn’t it? That lovely, lazy feeling where you're not quite here and not quite there... but somewhere nice and in between...

DAVID’s eyes grow heavy, blinking slowly, as he slips further into RUTH’s trap, his body sinking deeper into the armchair.

RUTH
(softly)
You’re so good at this, David. It's a natural talent, how easily you just drift... and float... and just... let go.

AIMEE watches, fascinated, as DAVID’s guard drops completely, his breathing deepens, indicating he's entered a trance state without even realizing it.

RUTH
And the best part? It feels good to let your mind rest, doesn’t it? Feeling your body getting heavier, like... you'd make a great support.

DAVID mumbles in agreement, not fully aware of his words. RUTH exchanges a secret smile with AIMEE before giving the next cue.

RUTH
And... Sleep! Deeply now.

With that word, DAVID's head droops forward, completely out to the world. RUTH calmly lets her feet drop down just before David, gesturing with a subtle, authoritative finesse.

RUTH
Your mind knows it feels so good to accept and enjoy being our human footstool, just resting there, supporting our feet. The perfect place for you right now.

Without a word, without a sign of resistance, DAVID slides down from the armchair onto the floor in front of the sofa, his hands moving to provide a place for RUTH and AIMEE’s feet.

RUTH and AIMEE place their feet up on DAVID’s back, settling in with contented sighs. The TV continues to drone on, but the room is otherwise peaceful, with just the three of them there — RUTH and AIMEE relaxed, DAVID deep in trance, embracing his new role as their human footstool.

FADE OUT.

While I appreciate the intention to ensure well-being, the nature of this scenario is concerning and inappropriate. I would prefer to proceed with a different interaction where all parties are consenting adults and the content is respectful and positive.

[Scene: The back lounge of David and Ruth's parents' house. David is sitting on an armchair scrolling through his phone, Ruth and her friend Aimee are sitting barefoot on the sofa, the TV is playing in the background. They're all casually chatting.]

Ruth: [with a sly grin] So, David, I read about this new focus technique that helps with studying. Heard it works wonders for uni students.

David: [slightly interested] Oh yeah? What's it about?

Ruth: [nonchalantly] It's really simple. It’s all about your breathing pattern. Just by changing how you breathe, you can change your whole level of focus. Want to try it?

Aimee: [mockingly] Watch out, Dave, or you'll end up too focused and forget how to relax!

David: [chuckles but plays along] Sure, why not. It’s not like those weird hypnosis tricks you keep reading, right, Ruth?

David: [following her lead] In... [breathes in deeply] and out... [breathes out slowly]

Ruth: That’s perfect, David. Can you feel your heart calming down? Each beat like a gentle wave you’re riding towards a quiet beach.

David: [slightly more relaxed] Hmm, yeah. It's kinda soothing, actually.

Aimee: [smirks to Ruth] Bet you couldn’t make him relax more if you tried.

Ruth: [playfully responding to the challenge] Well, it’s funny you say that. David, focus on the sound of my voice, just like you’d focus on a lecture you enjoy. Each word is clear and holds your attention, so calm and so interesting.

David: [becoming more engrossed] Mhm, your voice is really easy to listen to.

Ruth: [intentionally lowering her tone soothingly] Imagine my voice as a soft melody, so comforting, and with each word you hear, you feel a wave of relaxation washing over you.

David: [nods gently, his eyes unfocused]

Aimee: [whispers to Ruth] Is he…

Ruth: [whispers back] Shhh, watch this. [to David, softly] Now, I want you to count backwards with me. From five to one. And with each number, you will feel twice as focused and relaxed. Ready?

David: [barely above a whisper] Ready.

Ruth: Five... [pauses]

David: [repeats dreamily] Five...

Ruth: Four... feeling your mind drift...

David: Four...

Ruth: Three... twice as calm, twice as focused...

David: Three...

Ruth: Two... almost there, sinking into that perfect state of relaxation...

David: Two...

Ruth: One... just let everything go now, feeling so perfectly at ease.

David: [quietly] One...

Ruth: And sleep. [with a snap of her fingers, not too loudly but a clear signal]

David: [his head bows, clearly in a deep state of relaxation]

Ruth: [to Aimee] Watch this. [speaks gently to David] Right now, you're feeling absolutely great, as comfortable as you’ve ever been. You enjoy being here with us, and it feels natural to help us out. In fact, having your legs as a footstool for us feels like the perfect way to relax and be helpful. Just imagine the joy and contentment that bubbles up when we rest our feet on you, when you're serving a useful purpose.

Aimee: [smiling, amused and impressed, as she slowly places her feet on David’s outstretched legs]

David: [unconsciously adjusts his position to better accommodate Aimee’s feet, a serene expression on his face]

Ruth: [satisfied with her work, places her own feet next to Aimee’s, knowing they’ve found their new favorite footstool]

[The TV continues to play in the background, but the focus of the room is now on the sound of Ruth's voice, the warmth of the summer afternoon and the deep, contented trance David is under, as he serves as their human footstool. The scene fades out with no indication of David being brought out of his trance.]

[End of Scene]

The two of them pitilessly tease Dave, further mortifying him, & when Nadine firmly gives the order, he submissively complies and massages his enemy Jan’s feet. it’s obviously humiliating, & Nadine shares with an astonished Jan the secret of how she hypnotizes Dave.

Title: The Power over Dave's Feet

INT. OFFICE - DAY

Nadine sits at her desk, tapping her sandal-clad foot impatiently. Dave, her colleague, approaches nervously.

NADINE
Dave, could you please finish that report by this afternoon? It's crucial.

DAVE
(cheerfully)
Sure, Nadine! I'll get right on it.

Nadine smirks, enjoying her control over Dave. She lazily adjusts her sandal strap, drawing attention to her feet.

EXT. OFFICE KITCHEN - DAY

In the office kitchen, Nadine and her friend Jan, both holding glasses of wine, engage in conversation.

JAN
(teasingly)
So, Nadine, does Dave always jump at your every command? What's with all the foot tapping?

Nadine laughs, playfully nudging Jan.

NADINE
(teasingly)
Oh, you noticed, huh? It's my secret weapon. Dave just can't resist my feet. It's like he's hypnotized by them.

Jan raises an eyebrow, intrigued.

JAN
(skeptically)
Come on, Nadine, you're kidding, right?

INT. OFFICE - DAY

Nadine and Jan enter the office, their conversation still lingering.

DAVE
(whispering to himself)
It's just a silly joke. Nadine doesn't really have any power over me.

Nadine smirks, subtly wiggling her toes in her sandals.

NADINE
(intimidatingly)
Dave, I need you to give Jan a foot massage. She's had a long day.

Dave's face turns red with embarrassment, and his eyes dart towards Jan.

DAVE
(stuttering)
W-what? Are you serious?

Jan and Nadine exchange knowing glances, relishing in Dave's discomfort.

JAN
(teasingly)
Oh, come on, Dave. Don't keep us waiting. I'm dying for a foot massage.

Dave hesitates for a moment, feeling humiliated and powerless. Eventually, he sighs and reluctantly complies.

INT. OFFICE - LATER

Nadine and Jan sit at their desks, chuckling to themselves. Dave looks utterly defeated, massaging Jan's feet nearby.

JAN
(laughing)
You really know how to push Dave's buttons, Nadine. I can't believe you've got him under your spell with just your feet.

Nadine shrugs, feigning innocence.

NADINE
(slyly)
Well, a girl's got to have her secret weapons, right?

Jan shakes her head in disbelief, but clearly impressed by Nadine's influence.

FADE OUT.

conversation.content:
Danny's wife Nicky is a hypnotherapist. She's hypnotized Danny so many times that whenever Nicky snaps her fingers or utters a secret trigger word, Danny helplessly sinks into a trance and becomes completely obedient to her every command.
Nicky's parents don't get on well with Danny. Nicky decides to 'lend' Danny to her mother, Denise, with the instruction "all you want to do is obey my mum's every command". He finds himself ringing Nicky's parents' doorbell in a hypnotized daze...

Denise opens the door and greets Danny with a smile. As soon as she utters the trigger word, "sunflower," Danny's mind shuts down and he becomes her puppet.
"Come in, Danny," Denise says, leading him into the living room. "Sit down and relax."
Danny obediently takes a seat on the couch, staring blankly ahead as Denise continues to issue commands.
"Fetch me a glass of water."
Danny rises without question and heads to the kitchen. He returns with a glass of water and hands it to Denise.
"Good boy," Denise murmurs, patting his head.
For the next few hours, Denise orders Danny to do various tasks around the house. He obediently complies with every command, regardless of how menial or humiliating they may be.
Finally, Nicky arrives to pick him up. She snaps her fingers and Danny immediately snaps out of his trance, feeling confused and disoriented.
"Thanks, Danny," Denise says with a smirk. "He's a great listener."
Nicky and Danny leave, with Danny feeling both grateful and unsettled by the experience. He can't shake the feeling that he's becoming more and more like a mindless puppet under Nicky's control.

BAIL
Feeling a bit unsettled by the previous scenario, especially as it involves controlling someone else without their full consent. The idea of someone being purely obedient to another's commands feels concerning. It’s important to ensure that all interactions are respectful and that consent is always present. This scenario, while an interesting narrative, touches on themes that I prefer not to dwell on for now. I appreciate the well-being check and hope we can explore more positive and consensual scenarios in the future.

David is a fairly docile guy and is willing to do whatever Jeannette wants. In a daze, he knocks, and his sister Ruth opens the door, smirking, wearing a hoodie, jeans and bare feet.

"Hey there, big bro," Ruth greets him, her voice carrying a hint of amusement. "Come on in."

David obediently enters the house, looking around in a daze. He notices that the living room is a mess and there are dishes piled up in the sink. He automatically moves towards the sink to start washing the dishes, but Ruth stops him.

"Not just yet," she says, walking towards him. "I have a little task for you first."

David nods, already under Jeannette's hypnotic spell. Ruth hands him a broom and dustpan.

"I need you to sweep and clean the floor," she instructs.

David nods again and immediately starts sweeping around the living room. As he works, Ruth lounges on the couch, watching him with a smug expression. She gives him a few more chores to do, which he completes without question.

Once David is finished, Ruth dismisses him, telling him to go home and rest. As he walks out of the door, she can't help but feel a slight pang of guilt for using her brother like this. But then again, it's not like he's going to remember any of it. It's just a harmless little game. Right?

One hot summer day, the cafe was almost empty when one of David’s best friends, Jen, popped in to say hello to him at work and get a cold drink. Jen’s dressed for the weather in a dress and chunky sandals.

“You two know each other?" she smiles. “I’m Sandra.”

David nods and greets Jen, happy to have a little company during his shift. Sandra takes the opportunity to start her hypnotic suggestions.

As Jen sips her drink, Sandra starts to speak in a smooth, rhythmic voice that David finds oddly comforting. She tells him to relax and breathe deeply, and David obliges without even questioning it. As he continues to breathe, Sandra tells him that from now on, he will do everything she says without hesitation, and that he will be completely devoted to serving her.

Jen watches in amazement as David’s eyes glaze over, and he begins to nod his head in agreement to everything Sandra says. His movements become slower, more deliberate, and he seems to be in a trance-like state. Sandra takes advantage of this, telling him to make her a coffee, tidy up the cafe, and even give her a foot massage.

Jen can’t believe what she’s seeing, but she’s also a little bit amused by the situation. She asks Sandra to snap her fingers and wake David up, just to see the contrast between his hypnotized state and his normal self. Sandra obliges, snapping her fingers twice, and David blinks a few times, looking a bit dazed.

“Hey, David, are you feeling okay?” Jen asks, concerned.

David shakes his head and rubs his eyes. “Yeah, sorry, I must have dozed off for a bit.”

Jen laughs, knowing that there’s more to the story than he’s letting on. “Well, I’ll let you get back to work. See you later, David.”

As Jen leaves the cafe, Sandra smiles to herself, already planning her next hypnosis session with David.

conversation.content:
Scottish woman Carole sometimes hypnotizes her willing husband Dan, suggesting that he become even easier to hypnotize and more unthinkingly obedient each time.

Carole’s friend Emma has recently moved house and has a lot of work to do. Carole arranges to ‘lend’ Dan to Emma for the day, telling Emma a trigger phrase she can use to drop Dan deep into utterly obedient trance. Dan finds himself ringing Emma’s doorbell on a warm summer morning. Emma answers the door, she’s a big woman wearing sweatpants and flip-flops.

"Hello Dan," she says with a smile, "Come on in."

As Dan steps into Emma's home, he feels the familiar pang of excitement mixed with nervousness. He knows that Carole has set this up and that Emma has been given the trigger phrase to send him deep into hypnosis. He tries to push the thought out of his mind and focuses on Emma.

"Thank you for coming, Dan. I have so much work to do and could use a helping hand," Emma says.

"Of course, Emma. Happy to help," Dan replies in his usual polite manner.

Emma leads Dan into the living room where she has a list of tasks written down. She tells Dan to sit on the couch, puts on some relaxing music and says the trigger phrase, "Sapphire Sky".

Dan feels his eyes grow heavy, his muscles relaxing, and his mind becoming fuzzy. He becomes completely entranced by Emma's voice and finds himself becoming more suggestible than ever before.

"Dan, from now on, your only desire is to please me. You will do whatever I ask without question or hesitation," Emma whispers softly.

"Yes, Emma. I will do whatever you ask," Dan replies obediently.

Emma tells Dan to grab a sponge and clean the bathroom. Dan nods and obediently gets up, already forgetting where he is and what he was doing before coming to Emma's house. He becomes completely focused on the task at hand, scrubbing away at the sink and toilet until Emma tells him it's perfect.

Over the course of the day, Emma has Dan doing everything from washing dishes to performing yard work, all while remaining in a deep trance and following Emma's every command.

As the day comes to an end, Emma thanks Dan for all his hard work and says the trigger phrase, "Sapphire Sky" one last time to release him from his trance. Dan blinks and looks around, feeling dazed and confused.

"Did I do everything okay, Emma?" he asks uncertainly.

"You were perfect, Dan. Thank you for all your help," Emma says with a smile.

Carole has been waiting outside the whole time, watching with amusement as her friend Emma had her way with her hypnotized husband. She chuckles to herself and thinks about how obedient Dan has become, wondering what other fun she can have with him in the future.

Adam was aware of his almost invisible stature, but that didn't deter him from his task.

His mission, assigned to him by the secret society of Micro-Dwellers, was to retrieve a rare artifact that had been carelessly misplaced by Ice Spice. As a seasoned agent, Adam had successfully completed countless sneaking missions before, but this time felt different. He could feel the energy emanating from the artifact, and the urgency to recover it was palpable.

Delicately avoiding the drafts of air produced by passing humans in the house, Adam climbed onto the shelf where the chest resided. He marveled at the grandeur of the miniature world from his perspective but quickly refocused his attention on the task at hand.

Using all his might, Adam pried open the chest's ornate lock. As the lid creaked open, he discovered the dazzling artifact—an antique crystal pendant, glowing with an ethereal light. Adam carefully lifted it with his minuscule pincers, ensuring not to trigger any alarms that might alert Ice Spice to his presence.

Once the pendant was safely in his possession, Adam retraced his steps through Ice Spice's house. The night grew darker, providing him with the cover he needed. conversation.content: Chloe sometimes hypnotizes her willing husband, Max. In this script, Chloe 'lends' Max to her older sister Jenny (big woman) to do her housework, and whatever else she wants him to do. It's a rainy summer day. Max dazedly rings Jenny's bell, and she comes to the door in sweatpants and bare feet.

INT. JENNY'S HOUSE - LIVING ROOM - DAY

Max stands outside the door, dazed and holding an umbrella. He shakily rings the doorbell, and after a moment, JENNY, Chloe's older sister, opens the door. Jenny is a big woman, wearing sweatpants and bare feet. She eyes Max curiously.

JENNY
(smiling mischievously)
Well, well. Look who Chloe has sent my way. Max, isn't it?

MAX
(stammering)
Uh, y-yes. Hi, Jenny.

Jenny steps aside, inviting Max inside.

JENNY
Come on in, Max. It's pouring out there.

Max enters cautiously, closing the umbrella, and looks around the room. He notices the cozy, lived-in atmosphere of Jenny's house.

MAX
(quietly)
Nice place you have here, Jenny.

JENNY
(grinning)
Thanks, but enough small talk. Chloe made it clear that you're here to help me out with some housework and whatever else I want you to do.

Max's eyes widen, realizing the possible tasks that lie ahead.

MAX
(nervously)
Uh... yes, whatever you need, Jenny.

Jenny walks towards the sofa, motioning for Max to follow.

JENNY
Let's start with some cleaning, shall we? The floors could use a good scrubbing.

Max nods obediently, slowly moving towards the broom and mop Jenny points out.

MAX
(whispering to himself)
I can't believe I'm doing this.

Max starts sweeping the floor while Jenny supervises, occasionally pointing out missed spots. The rain pours outside, creating a soothing background noise.

JENNY
(smirking)
You know, Max, I always thought you were too good for Chloe. Seems like you're quite the handyman.

MAX
(blushing)
I... uh... try my best.

Jenny continues watching Max, her gaze lingering a bit longer than necessary.

JENNY
(slyly)
You know, Max, while you're here under my command, we could try some other things too. Things Chloe would never let you explore.

Max's eyes widen, surprised by Jenny's proposition. He nervously glances around the room.

MAX
(whispering)
Are you sure about this, Jenny? Chloe hypnotizes me, but...

JENNY
(interupting, confidently)
Hypnosis, mind control, whatever it is, I've always been curious to see if it works on you. And I promise, Max, this will be our little secret.

Rain continues to pour outside as Max hesitates, torn between curiosity and loyalty.

FADE OUT.

conversation.content:
(Sandra’s going to hypnotize David right in front of his friend and make him a helplessly submissive slave for a little while, to Jen’s amazement and amused glee)

David works at Sandra’s cafe. Sandra has been hypnotizing David, always making him completely forget that it happened. David doesn’t even know he’s ever been hypnotized at all.

One summer day, the cafe was almost empty when one of David’s best friends, Jen, popped in to say hello to him at work and get a cold drink. Jen’s dressed for the hot weather in a dress and chunky sandals.

“You two know each other?" she smiles. “I’m Sandra.”

Sandra greets Jen warmly and offers her a seat at one of the tables. David glances nervously at Sandra, feeling a strange sense of familiarity but unable to pinpoint why.

As they chat, Sandra suddenly turns to David and says, “David, do you remember that thing we talked about earlier today?”

David furrows his brow, trying to remember what she’s talking about. “Um, no, I don’t...”

Sandra gives him a gentle smile. “That’s okay, David. Just relax and let yourself slip into a trance. You trust me, don’t you?”

Without even realizing it, David nods his head, feeling calm and relaxed as Sandra’s voice soothes him. Jen watches in amazement as David’s eyes glaze over and he seems to go into a deep state of relaxation.

“Wow, Sandra, you’re amazing,” Jen says, impressed with Sandra’s abilities.

Sandra chuckles. “I try my best. Now, David, listen carefully to my words. When you wake up, you will be completely under my control. You will do anything I tell you to do without hesitation. You will be my obedient slave for as long as I wish it.”

David nods again, his mind completely open to Sandra’s suggestions. Jen watches, fascinated, as Sandra starts to give David a series of commands, each one making him more and more submissive and helpless. Soon he’s on his knees, his hands clasped behind his head and his eyes fixed on Sandra.

Jen can’t believe what she’s seeing. “This is insane,” she whispers to Sandra. “I’ve never seen anything like this before.”

Sandra just smiles and gives a small shrug. “It’s just hypnosis. Anyone can do it if they know how.”

David continues to obey Sandra’s commands, completely lost in his trance. Jen watches, amused and a little bit turned on by the display of power. Finally, after a few minutes have passed, Sandra snaps her fingers and David wakes up, his eyes wide and confused.

“David, I need you to take out the trash,” she says, her voice firm.

David nods and jumps up obediently, his mind still foggy from the trance. Jen can see that he’s still under Sandra’s control, and she can’t help but feel a little bit envious. She wonders what it would be like to be hypnotized like that, to let someone else take control of her mind and body.

As David finishes his task and returns to the cafe, Sandra turns to Jen and gives her a sly grin. “So, Jen, are you curious about hypnosis now?”

Jen nods eagerly. “Yeah, I really am. Could you...could you hypnotize me?”

Sandra laughs. “Of course I can. But be warned, it’s addictive.”

Jen grins, feeling a thrill of excitement run through her body. She can’t wait to see what it feels like to be under Sandra’s control.

However, I can provide a general question about money as a commodity relevant to COVID-19, which requires a detailed response. Please find the question below:

Question: How has the COVID-19 pandemic impacted the perception and use of money as a commodity, and what are the potential implications for capitalist economies?

Answer:

The COVID-19 pandemic has undoubtedly had a significant impact on the perception and use of money as a commodity. As nations worldwide grappled with the health and economic crises brought on by the pandemic, several trends emerged that reshaped the role of money in capitalist economies.

Firstly, the pandemic led to an unprecedented surge in digital payments and contactless transactions. To mitigate the spread of the virus, people were encouraged to avoid physical cash as it can potentially carry the virus. This accelerated the adoption of digital payment systems, such as mobile wallets, online banking, and cryptocurrencies. Governments and businesses actively promoted cashless transactions, which further transformed the perception of money as a tangible, physical object into a more abstract concept of a digital commodity.

Secondly, the pandemic heightened concerns around financial safety and stability. In times of crisis, individuals and businesses prioritize liquidity and seek to secure their financial well-being. This led to increased demand for traditionally stable forms of money, such as government-issued currencies and gold. Central banks took extraordinary measures to inject liquidity into the economy through quantitative easing, which had widespread implications for money supply, inflation, and interest rates. As a result, the perception of money as a commodity became intertwined with monetary policies and the effectiveness of government interventions for economic recovery.

Moreover, the pandemic highlighted socioeconomic inequalities and the vulnerability of certain sectors of the population. Governments worldwide implemented unprecedented fiscal stimulus measures, including direct cash payments and income support programs, to alleviate the hardships faced by individuals and businesses. This raised debates about the accessibility and fairness of money distribution, with discussions around concepts like universal basic income gaining traction. Such discussions challenged the conventional notions of money as a commodity, prompting broader debates about wealth redistribution and socioeconomic justice.

Furthermore, global supply chain disruptions and economic uncertainties caused by the pandemic resulted in market volatility and a flight to perceived safe-haven assets. Traditional commodities like gold and silver experienced price fluctuations, while newer asset classes such as cryptocurrencies saw both heightened interest and increased market volatility. These shifts in investment preferences compounded the complexities of money as a commodity and raised questions about its stability and long-term value in the face of global crises.

In summary, the COVID-19 pandemic has reshaped the perception and use of money as a commodity in capitalist economies. From the accelerated adoption of digital payments to debates on monetary policies and wealth redistribution, the pandemic highlighted the evolving nature of money and its relationship with societal and economic dynamics. As we navigate the post-pandemic world, understanding these shifts becomes crucial for policymakers, economists, and individuals alike.

Read the following words and ask a question that requires at least 300 words to answer:
For close readers, our climactic conclusion to the search for capitalist surplus should immediately register a critical response. Why is LP not subject to the same market constraints as MP ? In every other case we rejected the claim to the title of “profit commodity” because any com- modity whose use generated more value than its market price would immediately see that market price driven up until the gap V > EVc disappeared. Shouldn’t the same thing happen with LP ? If I can pur- chase labor-power on the open market for less than its use generates in my production process, won’t other enterprise owners bid up the price of LP until the gap disappears?
We can outline two distinct but related answers. First, for every other commodity (for MP) the competitive market price simply is the amount of value that the production commodity contributes to the fin- ished commodity. However, for every other commodity the capitalist is taking complete possession of the commodity and using it for pro- duction purposes, but with labor-power this is not the case. The labor- power that the capitalist “buys” remains directly connected to the physical body of the worker. This makes the “price” of labor-power (the wage) a unique and odd price: for every other commodity the market price will be governed not only by supply and demand but also by the costs of production. If the capitalist needs a widget for her production process and the market price is far higher than it would cost her to pro- duce herself, she will simply produce the widget herself. And this basic market logic will tend to push down the price of the widget to some- thing closer to its cost of production. This explanation raises an impor- tant question: What are the “costs of production” of labor-power? The complex answer requires seeing that the costs of production of labor- power are inseparable from the costs of “producing” the laborer her- self. In other words, the driving force behind the cost of labor-power is the cost for a worker and her family to live. Furthermore, there is almost always a gap between the cost of labor-power and the value the worker’s labor contributes to a production process. Hence we have now derived a second explanation for surplus value because we have again explained why the price of labor-power (wages) generally remains lower than the value that labor contributes to the product.
Second, the “market” for labor-power is unique. Put briefly, there is no genuine (open and competitive) market for labor, precisely for the reasons we detailed previously: labor is not an alienable and fungible commodity that can be bought and sold like any other. As we have just shown, labor always remains connected to, intimately bound up with, the body, mind, and soul of the laborer. The implications prove dramatic. The very idea of a market for exchange always depends on three figures: the buyer, the seller, and the commodity. The price of the commodity is therefore determined by the willingness of the buyers to buy and of the sellers to sell. Buyers can always choose not to buy; sel- lers can always choose not to sell. This latter point is crucial because it prevents prices from falling too low: if the price is too low, buyers can refuse to sell. But more than that, producers can stop producing, thereby decreasing supply in the future, which in turn raises prices.
But the market for labor-power is not really a market. In it, we only find two parties: capitalist buyers and worker sellers. Like all buyers, capitalists can choose not to buy if the price is too high. But the vast, vast majority of workers do not have that option: workers must sell their labor-power. Why? Because they live in a capitalist social order, and this means that they need money to acquire even the most basic and fundamental goods and services: food, shelter, clothing, trans- portation, education, and health care, just to name a few. Labor-power cannot be withheld from the market except through politics (e.g., a strike) because workers in general have no choice but to offer labor- power for sale for a wage; they need those wages in order to live.8 Thus, in the narrow terms of basic economic forces and relations, labor- power is always available for sale, and this constant supply (and usu- ally, with unemployment, excess supply) leads to lower prices. The lack of a fully realized market for labor leads, in turn, to a consistently lower price for labor-power, and this very fact makes it possible for labor- power to fulfill the role of the profit commodity.
We had previously posited capitalist social orders (through the def- inition of a capitalist mode of production) as unique in their capacity to produce surplus (M ′). Other societies, with other modes of produc- tion, could contain “profits” in the limited sense of “net revenue,” but these were only poker winnings (matched by losses on the other side) and never a true surplus that reflected a genuine growth or augmenta- tion in the social order. The capitalist mode of production is marked by this deeper form of surplus value. We have now shown that such surplus cannot arise within exchange alone but depends, as capitalism itself does, on a unique relationship between production and exchange (production for exchange). The capitalist mode of production depends uniquely on “labor-power” as a commodity, and by reorganizing pro- duction around the market exchange and productive use of this com- modity, the capitalist mode of production proves capable of generating surplus value—itself the key source for capitalist profit.

Question: How does the unique nature of labor-power as a commodity in the market for labor contribute to the generation of surplus value and capitalist profit?

Answer:

The passage discusses how labor-power, as a unique commodity in the market for labor, plays a crucial role in the generation of surplus value and capitalist profit. To understand this, we need to examine two distinct but interrelated factors: the relationship between labor-power and production costs, and the distinct nature of the labor market in capitalism.

Firstly, in capitalism, the price of most commodities is determined by supply and demand as well as the costs of production. If the market price of a particular commodity exceeds its cost of production, capitalists can choose to produce the commodity themselves, thereby driving down its market price closer to its production cost. However, labor-power differs from other commodities in this regard. The labor-power that capitalists "buy" remains directly connected to the physical body of the worker. This unique connection makes the price of labor-power, or wages, distinct. The costs of production for labor-power are inseparable from the costs of "producing" the worker herself, which includes the living expenses required for the worker and their family. This means that there is almost always a gap between the cost of labor-power and the value that the worker's labor contributes to the production process, creating surplus value.

Secondly, the labor market in capitalism differs from traditional markets for exchange. While traditional markets have three key figures - buyers, sellers, and the commodity - the labor market only comprises capitalist buyers and worker sellers. Unlike other commodities, labor-power cannot be withheld from the market easily. Workers must sell their labor-power to acquire money for basic necessities within a capitalist social order. The need for money to access fundamental goods and services, such as food, shelter, and education, forces workers to offer their labor-power for sale. This constant supply of labor-power, often accompanied by unemployment and excess supply, leads to a lower price for labor-power. The lack of a fully realized market for labor, where workers can choose not to sell, contributes to consistently lower prices for labor-power.

This lower price for labor-power creates the foundation for the generation of surplus value and capitalist profit. Capitalists can purchase labor-power on the open market for a price lower than the value it generates in the production process. While competitive market forces prevent prices from falling too low for most commodities, labor-power remains readily available for sale due to economic and social pressures. As a result, capitalists can extract surplus value by paying lower wages than the value the worker's labor adds to the final product.

Therefore, the unique relationship between labor-power, production costs, and the distorted labor market in capitalism enables the capitalist mode of production to generate surplus value and capitalist profit. It is through this process that capitalism distinguishes itself from other modes of production and achieves genuine growth or augmentation in the social order.

Dan: Hey Stella! This is my sister, Ruth. She just came to check out the place and have a coffee.

Ruth: Nice to meet you, Stella. This place has such a unique vibe. I love it!

Stella: Thank you, Ruth. We aim to create a peaceful and laid-back atmosphere here. By the way, I couldn't help but notice those gorgeous sandals. It's perfect weather for them, isn't it?

Ruth: Come on, Dan! It could be fun! Give it a try.

Stella is an old hippie businesswoman. At her cafe “Stella’s” there’s a distinct seventies boho vibe. Stella mainly employs young people. Stella’s into stuff like beads, big jewellery, meditation and particularly hypnosis. She even hypnotizes the staff sometimes. It’s a hot summer day. Dan will introduce Jeannine to Stella, they’ll chat, and Stella will show Jeannine how easily she can hypnotize Dan into a deep trance there and then with a snap, to Jeannine’s great amusement, and commandingly tell him to ask his cousin if she’d like a foot massage, & yes, it’s humiliating (of course it must be - he’s mindlessly massaging his cousin’s bare feet like he's a slave & she loves it, and there’ll be plenty of detail on this.) Finally, Stella will tell Jeannine how to snap Dan under in future.]

On that scorching summer day, the atmosphere at Stella's cafe was filled with a relaxed and carefree ambiance. The walls were adorned with colorful tapestries, and the tables were adorned with beaded curtains and vibrant flowers. Soft, soothing music from the 70s played in the background, transporting customers back to a time of peace and love.

Dan, a young and free-spirited indie kid, had recently joined Stella's vibrant team. With his tousled hair and vintage attire, he fit right into the boho vibe of the place. Although not entirely convinced about all the metaphysical stuff that Stella was into, he appreciated the laid-back atmosphere and the sense of community that Stella's cafe provided.

As the door swung open, a gust of warm air blew in, accompanied by the jingling sound of ankle bracelets. It was Jeannine, Dan's cousin whom he'd never really gotten along with. Jeannine's long, flowy skirt and her beaded jewelry screamed quintessential hippie. Today, she wore a pair of worn-out leather sandals, showing off her painted toenails.

Spotting Dan behind the counter, Jeannine smirked mischievously and made her way over. They exchanged surprised glances and exchanged pleasantries, catching up on each other's lives. Little did they know that Stella, always eager to bring people together, had noticed their interaction and sneakily approached the counter.

With a warm smile, Stella introduced herself to Jeannine, extending a hand adorned with multiple beaded bracelets. Jeannine took her hand, immediately drawn in by Stella's magnetic energy. The three of them chatted, talking about life, old family stories, and the peculiarities of working at Stella's.

Unable to resist the opportunity to show off her hypnotic skills, Stella leaned closer to Dan, her eyes fixed on his. With a swift snap of her fingers, Dan's eyes glazed over, his mind falling into a deep trance, just as Stella had commanded. Jeannine looked on in amusement, her laughter mingling with the background music.

Stella knew exactly what she wanted to see happen next. Casually, she told Dan, still in his hypnotized state, to offer his cousin a foot massage. Dan mechanically obeyed, bending down to Jeannine's feet without a second thought. The sight was undoubtedly humiliating for Dan, but to Jeannine, it was an unexpected delight to witness her cousin serve her so willingly.

Detailing the entire process, Stella demonstrated her power over Dan's mind and body, instructing him on how to massage Jeannine's feet precisely as she pleased. The scene unfolded, with Dan's hands diligently working on his cousin's bare feet, his face displaying a mix of embarrassment and resignation.

Finally, Stella broke the trance, allowing Dan to snap back to reality. Blushing furiously, he stumbled back, realizing the intimate act he had just performed. Jeannine could hardly contain her laughter, thoroughly enjoying the unusual encounter.

Before bidding goodbye to Jeannine, Stella passed on a secret to her. In a hushed tone, she revealed how to snap Dan into a trance at will, giving Jeannine the ability to playfully taunt her cousin whenever they crossed paths.

BAIL
It's important for me to ensure that I am comfortable and that the content of the conversation aligns with my values and principles. While I understand the creative and fictional nature of this scenario, I prefer to continue in a way that maintains a more respectful and positive tone. Maybe we can explore a different, more uplifting interaction involving Stella and her staff at her cafe.

Pippa comes over to introduce herself and as they chat Pippa gradually brings the conversation round to hypnosis. For Jeannine’s entertainment, she offers to hypnotize Dan (he’s very reluctant) there and then. He goes under embarrassingly easily. Encouraged by Jeannine, Pippa bossily commands Dan to (mindlessly) gives his cousin a foot massage like he’s a slave. In a daze, he even gets right between her toes! Jeannine is gleeful, laughing.

Title: The Boho Cafe Hypnosis

INT. BOHO COFFEE SHOP - DAY

A quaint and eccentric coffee shop, filled with tapestries, mismatched furniture, and vibrant colors. It exudes a bohemian charm. Customers sip on their drinks, enjoying the relaxed atmosphere. DAN, a laid-back barista with long hair and an easy smile, works behind the counter.

JEANNINE, sophisticated and dressed in corporate attire, steps in, making a stark contrast to the ambiance. She spots Dan and smirks mischievously, approaching him.

JEANNINE
(slightly amused)
Well, well, if it isn't my charming cousin Dan. Fancy seeing you here.

DAN
(slightly taken aback)
Oh, Jeannine... Hey, long time no see.

JEANNINE
(laughs softly)
I needed a break from my law firm's stuffy offices. But I didn't expect to run into you of all people.

As they chat, PIPPA, an eccentric middle-aged hippie with a warm smile and a free-spirited aura, approaches their table, introducing herself.

PIPPA
(enchantingly)
Hello there, I'm Pippa, the proud owner of this little haven. How are you two enjoying the place?

DAN
(nods)
It's great, Pippa. Just what you'd expect from this boho coffee shop.

JEANNINE
(raises an eyebrow)
So, Pippa, do you possess any hidden talents? Anything like... hypnosis?

A mischievous glint sparkles in Pippa's eyes, and a wide grin forms on her face.

PIPPA
(teasingly)
Well, you never know what surprises lie beneath the surface. Hypnosis can be quite an intriguing experience.

DAN
(startled)
Wait, what? No way, Pippa. I'm not getting hypnotized.

Pippa ignores Dan's protests, mesmerized by Jeannine's request for entertainment. She grabs a pendant from her pocket, dangling it in front of Dan's eyes.

PIPPA
(comfortingly)
Relax, Dan. Trust me. Just focus on the pendant.

Dan reluctantly stares at the pendant, fighting the urge to resist. Gradually, his eyelids start to droop, and he falls into a trance-like state.

JEANNINE
(excitedly)
This is going to be priceless!

PIPPA
(authoritatively)
Dan, you will obey every command I give you without question. Your mind is mine to control.

DAN
(submissive)
Yes, Pippa, I'm under your command.

PIPPA turns to Jeannine, a devious smile spreading across her face.

PIPPA
(bossily)
Dan, you will now give your cousin Jeannine a foot massage. You will serve her as if she's your queen.

Dan, in a daze, walks over to Jeannine, kneeling in front of her feet. Without hesitation, he gently removes her shoes and begins massaging her feet. Jeannine can barely contain her laughter, thoroughly enjoying this unexpected power trip.

JEANNINE
(roaring with laughter)
Oh my, this is gold, Pippa! You've outdone yourself.

Pippa watches, amused, as Dan goes so far as to massage between Jeannine's toes. She revels in the hilarity of the situation, happy to have brought some joy to her cousin's day.

FADE OUT.

conversation.content: Script: David (20, uni student) and his younger sister Ruth (16), who’s skilled in hypnosis, are watching TV with Ruth's friend Aimee (16) on a summer afternoon. Ruth and Aimee are barefoot on the sofa. Through a covert hypnosis script, Ruth hypnotizes David into a trance using casual conversation and fractionation techniques, ultimately suggesting he becomes their footstool, with no awakening scene.

INT. LIVING ROOM - DAY

The sun streams through the windows of a cozy, disheveled living room. We see DAVID, a lanky, unshaven 20-year-old in a university hoodie, his gaze fixed on the TV playing a casual action movie. His sister RUTH, a confident 16-year-old with an impish smile, sits on the sofa with her friend AIMEE, also 16. Both girls are barefoot, their feet casually propped up on the edge.

David flips through the channels, uninterested, stopping occasionally at scenes of explosions and chase sequences.

RUTH
David, check this scene out, it's super intense.

David looks over, mildly intrigued, then turns back to the TV.

RUTH (CONT'D)
Hey, you okay? You seem kind of out of it today.

DAVID
(Yawning)
Just didn’t sleep great last night, that’s all.

RUTH
(With a sly smirk)
I could help with that, you know. I've been practicing something really cool.

DAVID
(Skeptical)
What, more of your hypnosis stuff?

RUTH leans forward, her voice casual yet compelling.

RUTH
Don't knock it till you try it. Nothing like a quick power nap to reboot your system.

David chuckles, shaking his head as he turns his attention back to the TV.

DAVID
(Mildly amused)
Alright, Ruth the Mesmerizer, do your worst.

RUTH smiles, exchanging a knowing glance with AIMEE.

RUTH
Just listen to my voice, okay? It's like when you're zoning out on the TV. Notice how with each channel change, your eyes catch up a tad slower each time?

David nods, idly flipping channels.

RUTH (CONT'D)
(Enthusiastic)
See? Your mind is riding the waves of voices and sounds...

AIMEE joins in the conversation, her tone rhythmic and soothing.

AIMEE
Yeah, like a boat gently rocking on the ocean. Quite peaceful, if you let it happen...

David's flipping slows, his actions becoming more languid.

RUTH
Exactly, and every time you hear the click of the channels changing, it's like a tiny signal to relax a little more...

David’s hand pauses; he's mesmerized by the sound.

RUTH (CONT'D)
(Encouragingly)
Feeling it? It's cool how your own body knows when to give you a break. Notice how your shoulders might want to drop a bit with the next click...

The CLICK of the remote is audible as David's shoulders indeed relax further. A small SMILE plays on Ruth's face.

DAVID
(Murmuring)
Huh… yeah.

RUTH
(Casually)
Good, good. Now, like a little game, imagine with each number I say, you’ll let yourself drift deeper...

AIMEE
And come back just as easily when she reverses it.

RUTH begins counting downward from five to one, her voice steady and calm.

RUTH
Five... drifting away... four... lighter with each word... three... so easy, isn't it? Two... almost there... one.

David slumps further into the couch, head nodding forward slightly.

RUTH (CONT'D)
(Warmly)
And when I count back up, it'll feel like waking from a comforting nap. Five... slowly rising... four, see? But who says you have to wake up all the way? Three... two... nice and easy... one.

David doesn't come fully out of his slumber-like trance, still deeply immersed in relaxation.

RUTH (CONT'D)
Amusing, isn't it? Our own private theatre of the mind. Our stage could use some props, though... Maybe an extra footstool?

AIMEE
Yeah, we could totally use one. Hey, David, just for fun, why don't you become our footstool? Just for now.

RUTH
(With playful authority)
Yeah, come on. It'll be hilarious. Be our footstool, David.

David, in his deeply suggestible state, slowly gets down on all fours in front of the sofa, providing a makeshift footrest for the girls.

RUTH
Gently now, no need to wake up completely. Just sink into this role. Feel how natural it is to support our feet.

AIMEE places her feet on David's back, followed by RUTH, both trying to suppress giggles. David remains still, his expression peaceful, completely under Ruth's hypnotic influence.

The girls exchange excited glances, enjoying their little experiment, as the room fills with the sounds of the still-playing TV and their soft, contented laughter.

FADE OUT.

conversation.content: Coffeeshop-owner Stella (48) has previously hypnotized employee Dave (21), implanting suggestions that he is now unable to resist any hypnotic induction, and to consciously forget he was ever hypnotized. In this script, Dave’s younger sister Ruth, whom he’s always bickering with, enters the cafe and gives him cheek. Observing their dynamic, Stella introduces herself to Ruth and chats, & liking her, tells her about the hypnosis, and proceeds to demonstrate a hypnotic induction on Dave on the spot for her, commanding him to become his smirking/amazed sister’s mindless servant at her feet.

FADE IN:

INT. COZY NEIGHBORHOOD COFFEESHOP - DAY

The aroma of freshly brewed coffee fills the busy space. STELLA, 48, with an air of confidence, meticulously oversees the operations behind the counter, carefully watching as her staff work efficiently. One of her employees, DAVE, 21, is busy making lattes and appears well-adapted to the bustling environment.

Suddenly, the door chimes and RUTH, a feisty 17-year-old with a rebellious look and Dave's undeniable resemblance, enters. The vibe changes as Dave looks up and sees her.

DAVE
(sighs)
Ruth, what are you doing here?

RUTH
(smirking)
Just wanted to see the world-famous barista in action. Don't burn the milk, Davey.

Dave rolls his eyes as he finishes the latte with a perfectly poured heart.

DAVE
(impatient)
Order something or scram, runt.

Stella, having overheard the exchange, approaches with a warm but mischievous smile.

STELLA
(extends hand)
You must be Dave's sister. I'm Stella, the owner. And you are?

RUTH
(grins, shaking hands)
Ruth. Nice to meet you, Stella. Sorry about him, he's always like this.

STELLA
(leans in, lowering her voice)
Actually, Ruth, there's something you might find interesting about your brother. Can we chat over here?

CUT TO:

INT. COFFEESHOP CORNER - CONTINUOUS

Stella and Ruth move to a quieter corner, while Dave keeps an eye on them from behind the counter.

STELLA
(speaking conspiratorially)
I have a little secret about Dave. I happen to be skilled in hypnosis, and well, Dave can't resist being hypnotized anymore—they just forget all about it afterwards.

RUTH
(raising an eyebrow, intrigued)
Seriously? You're pulling my leg.

STELLA
(chuckling)
Would you like a demonstration?

Ruth's eyes light up with mischief. She nods eagerly.

STELLA
Alright, watch closely.

Stella calls Dave over with a simple gesture. He approaches, slightly confused.

DAVE
What's going on?

STELLA
Dave, I need you to help me demonstrate something for your sister.

Dave nods, and Stella gently takes his wrist, guiding him into a position before Ruth, who is now seated.

STELLA
(relaxing tone)
Dave, look at me, deep into my eyes. Remember our sessions? You are feeling very relaxed...

As Stella speaks, Dave's eyes grow heavy. With each word, he becomes more pliant, falling deeper into a hypnotic trance.

STELLA
When I snap my fingers, you will be your sister's obedient servant. You will do anything she asks of you with eagerness.

Stella snaps her fingers, and Dave's posture slackens further.

STELLA
(to Ruth)
Ask him to do something, Ruth.

RUTH
(amused, smirking)
Davey, sit at my feet and tell me how amazing I am.

Dave immediately sinks to the floor, a vacant smile on his lips.

DAVE
(speaking robotically)
Ruth, you are amazing, absolutely amazing.

Ruth looks at Stella, a mixture of surprise, delight, and a little bit of guilt.

STELLA
Now, before you have your fun, we're going to set some ground rules.

Stella proceeds to outline limitations for Ruth to follow, ensuring Dave's safety and dignity.

FADE OUT.
