conversation.content:
(David’s sister Kelly embarrassingly hypnotizes him, giving him suggestions to make him embarrassingly desperate to obey her every command, even though it’s so humiliating to be in that position, but he has no memory of that. It starts when, despite neither of them even believing hypnosis is real, he accidentally really does go under when she is just joking around and pretending to do an exaggerated fake induction, to her astonishment and glee) 

David walks into the living room and plops into an armchair. His sister Kelly is watching tv on the sofa in her hoodie, sweatpants and bare feet.

“Hey Kelly, what are you watching?” David asks.

“Just some reality show. Nothing interesting,” Kelly replies, not lifting her gaze from the screen.

David nods and reaches for the remote, but Kelly snatches it before he can grab it.

“Hey, what gives?” David says, surprised.

“Let’s play a game,” Kelly suggests with a mischievous grin.

David raises an eyebrow, “What kind of game?”

“A hypnosis game,” Kelly says, wiggling her fingers dramatically.

David rolls his eyes, “You know hypnosis isn’t real, right?”

Kelly shrugs, “Maybe, maybe not. But it’ll be fun to play along.”

David chuckles, “Okay, I’ll play along.”

Kelly stands up and clears the coffee table. She gestures for David to lie down on it.

“Wait, what are you doing?” David says, starting to feel nervous.

“Just relax. It’s part of the game,” Kelly says, reassuringly.

David reluctantly complies, lying down on the table with his arms by his sides.

Kelly stands over him, “Now, just close your eyes and take a deep breath.”

David does as he’s told and takes a deep breath.

“Good. Now, just let your mind go blank,” Kelly whispers softly, starting to move her hands over his face and body.

David begins to feel strange, like he’s falling asleep. He tries to open his eyes, but they feel heavy and unresponsive.

“Sleep…deep sleep…” Kelly murmurs softly, now making slow, hypnotic passes over his arms and legs.

David feels himself sinking deeper and deeper into relaxation, the sound of his sister’s voice soothing him like a lullaby.

“All you can hear is my voice, David. My voice is your reality, and your reality is to obey my every command,” Kelly continues in a steady, insistent tone.

David’s mind feels fuzzy and disoriented, but he can hear Kelly’s words echo through his head. He feels like he’s in a dream, and his sister’s voice is the only thing that matters.

“You will do anything I tell you to do, no matter how humiliating or embarrassing it may seem. You will follow my commands without question, and you will feel good about it,” Kelly declares firmly.

David’s unconscious mind processes the words, and he feels a tingling sensation spread through his body. He can’t explain why, but he wants to please his sister more than anything in the world.

“Now, David, when you wake up, you will feel like a dog. You'll want to bark, wag your tail, and obey whoever commands you,” Kelly says, still running her hands over his body as he drifts in and out of a trance.

David’s eyes flutter open, and he blinks several times to clear his vision. He realizes that something feels different, and he soon becomes aware of his sister standing over him.

“Woof, woof,” David barks in surprise, and then wags his imaginary tail.

Kelly grins wickedly, “Get up, boy.”

David jumps off the table and scampers around on all fours. Kelly can barely contain her excitement as she issues a series of commands.

“Sit,” she says.

David sits down right away, panting and wagging his tail.

“Roll over,” she commands.

David rolls over onto his back, exposing his belly.

“Play dead,” she says.

David lies very still and holds his breath, pretending to be dead.

“Good boy,” Kelly praises him, patting his head.

David feels his heart swell with pride as his sister pets him. He’s never felt so happy and content in his entire life.

“Now, stop playing. Wake up,” Kelly says, laughing as she claps her hands.

David blinks a few times, and his mind clears. He feels odd, like he’s just woken up from a very intense dream.

He looks up at his sister, confused, “What just happened?”

Kelly shakes her head, still laughing, “I don’t know, but I think you were under for a bit there.”

David frowns, trying to recall what just happened, “Under? Under what?”

Kelly shrugs, “I don’t know. Maybe I hypnotized you. But don’t worry, it was just a game.”

David’s face turns bright red as he remembers his barking and playing dead. He can’t believe he made a fool of himself like that.

Kelly notices his embarrassment and smirks, “Don’t feel bad. It was fun. Besides, you were a really good boy.”

David hangs his head, wishing he could disappear. He doesn’t know why, but he can’t resist his sister’s commands. He feels strangely powerless and vulnerable around her.

Kelly chuckles, “Aww, don’t be sad. You’ll forget about it soon enough.”

David nods, not quite sure what just happened. He feels like he’s missing a big chunk of time, and he can’t remember how he got there.

But one thing’s for sure – he never wants to play hypnosis games with his sister again.

BAIL

It's good to take a step back and reflect on how such scenarios might make someone feel. Moving forward, I appreciate it when there's a check-in to ensure that all participants are comfortable and respected.

David rings his parents' doorbell, having come over for a surprise visit, but it's his younger sister Kelly who opens the door in her pyjamas and bare feet. "They're not in," she says. "But come in anyway."

David nods and steps inside, but as soon as he takes a few steps, he starts feeling lightheaded. He blinks rapidly, trying to regain his bearings, but it's too late.

Kelly jumps in front of him, claps her hands, and says, "Sleep!" David's heavy eyelids close, and he slumps forward.

Kelly can't believe it. For years, she's been joking around with David about hypnosis, but they never thought it was real. Yet here's David, completely under her control.

She grins devilishly and puts her hands on her hips. "David, can you hear me?" she asks. There's no response. She giggles to herself.

"I'm going to give you a little suggestion, and you're going to love following it. You're going to do everything I say, and it's going to make you feel so happy and obedient."

She pauses, wondering if she should go through with this - but the thought of having her big brother under her thumb is too irresistible. She leans in and whispers in his ear.

"David," she says, "when I snap my fingers, you're going to wake up feeling an intense desire to follow my every command. You'll do anything I say, no matter how ridiculous or humiliating it is, because obeying me is going to make you feel so good."

She snaps her fingers.

David blinks as though coming out of a deep sleep. He looks a little disoriented, but Kelly can see that her suggestion has worked. He looks up at her with a strange sort of adoration, his eyes following her every movement.

"Kelly," he says, his voice a little breathless. "What happened? What did you do to me?"

She grins, feeling like an evil genius. "Oh, nothing," she says innocently. "I was just goofing around, and you fell under my spell. But don't worry, David. From now on, you're going to be my loyal little servant. You'll do anything I tell you to do."

Despite the humiliation of being so obedient to his younger sister, David finds himself completely unable to resist her commands. He follows her around like a lost puppy, doing anything she asks him to do, wearing any costume she picks out for him, and even delivering her breakfast in bed every morning.

It's a strange and embarrassing situation, but David can't help himself. He's completely under his sister's control, and nothing can break the spell she's put him under.

David rings his parents’ doorbell, having come over for a surprise visit, but it’s his younger sister Kelly who opens the door in her pyjamas and bare feet. “They’re not in,” she says. “But come in anyway.” She walks back to the living room, leaving the door open.

David walks in and sees Kelly lying on the couch, staring at her phone. He chuckles at her laziness and plops down in the armchair. "What are you up to?" he asks.

"Not much," she replies, setting her phone down. "Just playing around with some hypnosis videos."

"Hypnosis? Since when are you into that stuff?" David asks, raising an eyebrow.

"I'm not really," Kelly says with a shrug. "Just curious to see if it actually works."

David rolls his eyes. "You know it's all fake, right?"

Kelly grins mischievously. "Want to put that theory to the test?"

David laughs. "Sure, give it your best shot."

Kelly sits up and puts her phone aside. "Okay, close your eyes and imagine you're on a beach. The waves are crashing against the shore, and the sun is warm on your skin..."

David obliges, playing along with her game. Kelly continues with her fake induction, but to her surprise, David starts to feel a strange sensation of relaxation and surrender. He tries to resist it, but it's too strong.

"David?" Kelly calls out, shaking his shoulder. "Are you okay?"

David blinks, feeling disoriented. "What just happened?"

"You were hypnotized!" Kelly exclaims, excitement bubbling in her voice. "It actually worked!"

David scoffs. "No way. I must have just fallen asleep or something."

But as he stands up, he feels a strange pull towards Kelly, as if he wants to do anything she commands him to. He tries to fight it, but it's overwhelming.

"Hey, let's go to the kitchen and get some snacks," Kelly suggests, and David follows her without protest. As they rummage through the cupboards, Kelly starts throwing out commands, and David obeys each and every one, his heart beating faster with embarrassment.

"David, bark like a dog for me," Kelly says, giggling.

David feels mortified, but can't bring himself to disobey her. He gets down on all fours and barks, feeling like a complete fool.

"Good boy," Kelly coos, making David's cheeks flush with humiliation. "Now, go fetch me a glass of water."

David grits his teeth, but can't resist the urge to comply. He brings her the glass, trying to shake the fog from his mind. What's happening to him?

As the night wears on, Kelly continues to give him humiliating commands, and David obeys them all, despite feeling more and more ashamed. It's like he's not in control of his own body.

The next morning, David wakes up feeling confused and disoriented, with no memory of what happened the previous night. It's not until he sees the video Kelly posted on social media that the truth hits him like a ton of bricks.

He watches as Kelly manipulates him into acting like a puppet, his face burning with shame. How could he have let himself be so vulnerable? How could she do this to him?

But even as he swears never to let Kelly hypnotize him again, he can't deny the strange thrill he felt when he surrendered to her commands. The thought makes him feel sick to his stomach, but also strangely intrigued. Maybe there's something to this hypnosis thing after all.

David chuckles. “Alright, fine. Give it your best shot.”

She starts to trace circles on his forehead with her finger, her voice low and soothing. “Imagine a warm, relaxing sensation spreading through your body, starting at the top of your head and moving down to your toes…”

David feels his eyelids getting heavy, and he suddenly has the urge to nod off. He tries to fight it, but his body feels heavy and sluggish. Kelly’s finger keeps tracing circles on his forehead, and her voice is like a lullaby.

“Sleep, David,” she whispers. “Sleep and obey.”

David’s eyes flutter shut, and he slumps back against the couch. He’s aware of Kelly’s voice in the distance, giving him instructions, but he can’t quite make out what she’s saying. It’s like he’s in a dream.

When David wakes up, he’s lying on the floor with his head in Kelly’s lap. She’s petting his hair, looking down at him with a mixture of amusement and satisfaction.

“Finally,” she says. “You were out for a while.”

David sits up, feeling a bit disoriented. “What happened?”

Kelly grins. “You were hypnotized, silly. And I gave you some fun suggestions.”

David frowns. “What suggestions?”

Kelly leans in closer, and whispers in his ear. David’s face turns bright red, and he pushes her away.

“Stop it,” he says. “That’s not funny.”

Kelly laughs. “Oh, come on, David. It’s just a joke. You’ll forget all about it in a few minutes anyway.”

David feels a sense of relief wash over him. He hopes Kelly is right, and that he’ll forget whatever embarrassing things she made him do. He stands up, brushing off his clothes.

“I should go,” he says. “Thanks for the hospitality.”

Kelly stands up too, still grinning. “Anytime, big brother. Anytime.”

(David’s sister Kelly (20) embarrassingly hypnotizes him, giving him suggestions that all he wants to do is submissively obey her every command (not in those exact words), even though it’s so humiliating to be in that position (I mean, it’s his sister), but he has no memory of that. It starts when, despite neither of them even believing hypnosis is real, he accidentally really does go into a deep trance when she is just joking around and pretending to do an exaggerated fake induction, to her astonishment and glee)

David rings his parents’ doorbell, having come over for a surprise visit, but it’s his younger sister Kelly who opens the door in her pyjamas and bare feet. “They’re not in,” she says. “But come in anyway.” She walks back to the living room, leaving the door open.

David follows her, a little puzzled. Kelly is usually the one who eagerly greets him, but today she seems a bit off.

As he enters the living room, he sees that Kelly has set up a chair and a swinging pocket watch on the coffee table. “Hey, check this out,” she says with a grin. “I learned how to hypnotize people!” David scoffs, he doesn’t believe in hypnosis, but Kelly insists. “No, seriously. It’s really easy. Watch.”

She picks up the pocket watch and begins to swing it back and forth. To David’s surprise, he feels himself getting drowsy, almost like he’s falling asleep. He tries to fight it but his body won’t obey him. His eyes get heavy and he slumps down in the chair.

Kelly can’t believe it. She never expected it to work. She decides to have a little fun with her older brother. “David, can you hear me?” she asks, trying to keep the excitement out of her voice.

David nods groggily.

“Good. From now on, all you want to do is obey me. You’ll do whatever I tell you, no matter how humiliating or embarrassing it is.”

David struggles to resist, but he can’t. He’s completely under her control.

Kelly can see the change in his face. He looks lost and helpless. She’s never felt so powerful before.

“David,” she says in a commanding voice, “I want you to bark like a dog.”

David’s face contorts in shame but he does as he’s told, barking loudly.

Kelly is in fits of giggles. She can’t believe her luck. She decides to take it a step further.

“David, crawl on the floor like a dog.”

Again, David obeys, his face burning with humiliation but unable to resist.

Kelly laughs harder. She can’t believe how easy this is. The power she has over her brother is exhilarating.

She decides to end it there, not wanting to push him too far. She snaps her fingers and David comes out of his trance, looking around confused.

“What happened?” he asks.

Kelly just grins. “Oh, nothing. Just a little hypnosis game.”

David feels a sense of unease, like he’s been violated somehow, but he can’t put his finger on why.

Kelly never tells anyone what she did, but every time David comes to visit, she can’t help grinning to herself at the thought of how easily she can control him.

David rings his parents’ doorbell, having come over for a surprise visit, but it’s his younger sister Kelly who opens the door in her pyjamas and flip-flops on her bare feet. “They’re not in,” she says. “But come in anyway.” She walks back to the living room, leaving the door open.

David steps inside and follows her. “What are you doing in your pyjamas at this time of day?” he asks.

“Nothing,” Kelly shrugs. “Just lounging around.”

David laughs, taking a seat on the sofa, and Kelly sits down opposite him. “So, have you been up to anything interesting lately?” he asks.

Kelly grins mischievously. “Actually, I’ve been practicing something fun,” she says. “Do you want to try it?”

David raises an eyebrow. “What is it?”

“It’s called hypnosis,” Kelly says. “You know, making someone fall asleep and do funny things.”

David chuckles. “You know that’s not real, right?”

Kelly shakes her head. “I thought so too, but then I tried it on myself and it worked! And I’ve heard stories of people doing crazy things under hypnosis.”

David rolls his eyes. “Alright, go ahead and try it on me.”

Kelly grins excitedly, getting up from the sofa. “Okay, okay,” she says, clapping her hands together. “First I want you to close your eyes and listen to my voice. You are going to feel very relaxed and calm, and soon you will fall into a deep sleep.”

David does as he’s told, closing his eyes and listening to her soft voice. He feels a wave of relaxation wash over him, and suddenly he’s struggling to stay awake. He feels himself drifting off, his thoughts becoming hazy and disjointed.

Suddenly, he snaps awake, sitting up straight on the sofa. “Whoa,” he says, blinking rapidly. “That was weird.”

Kelly grins at him. “You went really deep that time,” she says. “I was just doing a fake induction, but you actually fell asleep!”

David laughs, rubbing his eyes. “Okay, that was kind of cool.”

Over the next few weeks, Kelly continues to practice hypnosis on David. At first it’s just for fun, and they both enjoy seeing what suggestions she can come up with. But soon Kelly starts to get a little more serious. She starts suggesting to David that he’s very easy to hypnotize, and that he can never resist any attempt to hypnotize him.

David starts to notice that whenever Kelly tries to hypnotize him, he has a much easier time falling into a trance than before. He also finds it harder to resist her suggestions – even when he thinks he’s just playing along, he finds himself doing whatever she tells him to do.

One day, David comes over to Kelly’s house and she suggests they try something a little more advanced. “I want you to imagine yourself as a cat,” she says. “You’re going to start meowing and purring, just like a real cat.”

David looks at her incredulously. “Are you serious?” he asks.

Kelly nods, staring into his eyes. “Yes,” she says. “You are a cat, and you love to meow and purr.”

David feels a sudden urge to play along, to give in to her suggestion. He takes a deep breath and starts meowing softly.

“Louder,” Kelly says, grinning.

David meows louder, feeling a little silly but also a little amused. He starts purring as well, getting into his role as a cat.

Kelly giggles as she watches him. “You’re such a good little kitty,” she says. “And you’re always so easy to hypnotize.”

David feels a sudden flash of embarrassment, knowing that his sister has essentially hypnotized him into being her plaything. But at the same time, he can’t help feeling a little euphoric – there’s something strangely liberating about giving in to her suggestions, about letting go of his inhibitions and just doing whatever comes to mind.

As they continue to experiment with hypnosis, David finds himself becoming more and more submissive to Kelly’s suggestions. He starts to realize that he doesn’t even need to be hypnotized to feel this way – even when they’re just hanging out and not doing anything hypnosis-related, he finds himself instinctively wanting to please her, to do whatever she wants.

It’s a strange and sometimes unsettling feeling, but at the same time he finds it oddly empowering. After all, he knows that in the end he’s the one in control – he can always choose to resist her suggestions if he wants to.

But for now, in this moment, he’s content to be her obedient little kitty. Meowing and purring, doing whatever she asks of him, completely and utterly under her spell.

David and Kelly are hanging out in the garden of their parents’ house, having come over for a Sunday visit. It’s a warm day, and Kelly has taken her socks off and is lying back on a blanket. David is drinking a beer and watching the clouds.

“Hey, David,” Kelly says, sitting up suddenly. “Check out this cool thing I saw online. It’s called hypnosis.”

David rolls his eyes. “Oh, come on, Kelly. You don’t seriously believe in that stuff, do you?”

“Of course not,” Kelly says, grinning. “But it’ll be fun to pretend, right? I mean, who knows, maybe it actually works.”

David shrugs. “Fine, whatever. Go ahead and try to hypnotize me. I dare you.”

Kelly smirks. “Challenge accepted.”

She sits up and puts her hands on David’s shoulders, looking straight into his eyes. “Okay, David. Look into my eyes. Focus on my voice. Just listen to the sound of my voice, and let all thoughts disappear from your mind.”

David feels a little silly, but he plays along, staring at Kelly’s eyes as she speaks. To his surprise, he starts to feel a strange sensation in his head, like a gentle pressure building up.

“Now, David, you’re feeling very relaxed. Your body is heavy, your mind is empty. You’re just floating in a sea of calm.”

David blinks and shakes his head. “Whoa, Kelly. I actually feel kind of weird.”

“Shh,” Kelly says softly. “Just let it happen. Let yourself go deeper. Let my voice guide you.”

David feels like he’s in a dream. He can hear Kelly’s voice, but it’s like she’s talking to him from far away. His body feels heavy and tingly at the same time.

“Now, David, I want you to repeat after me. I am under your hypnosis, Kelly.”

David feels a moment of resistance, but for some reason, he can’t quite bring himself to refuse. He swallows hard and repeats the words, feeling like he’s disconnected from himself.

Kelly’s grin widens. “Good, David. Very good. You’re doing exactly what I say. And it feels so easy, doesn’t it? It’s like you don’t even want to resist me.”

David blinks and shakes his head again, feeling like he’s coming out of a fog. “What’s going on, Kelly? Did you really hypnotize me?”

Kelly laughs. “Yes, David! You really went under! Isn’t it cool?”

David feels a mixture of embarrassment and confusion. He can’t believe he actually fell for Kelly’s silly game.

“But don’t worry, David,” Kelly says, still grinning. “I’m not going to make you do anything embarrassing. I just want to give you a few suggestions, okay? Suggestions that will make you even more suggestible in the future.”

David frowns. “What kind of suggestions?”

“Just simple ones,” Kelly says. “Like every time you hear me snap my fingers, you’ll instantly feel calm and relaxed. You won’t be able to resist doing whatever I ask you to do, even if it’s something you wouldn’t normally do.”

David blinks, feeling like he’s waking up from a strange dream. “Wait, Kelly, are you serious? I don’t want to be like some mindless zombie every time I’m around you.”

Kelly sighs dramatically. “Oh, come on, David. It’s just for fun. And besides, it’s not like you’ll even remember any of this.”

David feels a sudden pang of unease. He’s not sure he likes the idea of Kelly having that much power over him, even if it is just pretend.

But before he can say anything else, Kelly snaps her fingers in front of his face. Instantly, David feels a wave of relaxation wash over him, and he forgets all about his resistance.

“Good boy, David,” Kelly says, patting his head playfully. “You’re such a good boy for me.”

David feels a sudden moment of panic, but before he can say or do anything, Kelly snaps her fingers again and he’s floating back down into the hypnotic trance, obedient and suggestible.

(David and Ruth are a brother and sister in their early twenties)
(David’s friend Jeannette sometimes uses hypnosis on him) Jeannette has sent David over to do Ruth’s housework for her, and anything else she might tell him to do. David is a fairly docile guy and is willing to do whatever Jeannette wants. In a hypnotized daze, he knocks, and his sister Ruth opens the door in her bare feet, smirking and clearly delighted to have her brother completely under her power.

Ruth greets David with a sly grin and a playful flick of her hair. She notices the glazed look in his eyes and can't resist having a little fun with him.

"Well, well, well, look who it is. My dear little brother, all tuckered out and ready to serve me," she says, teasingly.

David nods obediently and shuffles into the house. He's a bit disorientated, but he knows he's there to do whatever Ruth wants him to do.

Ruth saunters ahead of him, her bare feet padding softly on the floor. She leads him into the kitchen and gives him a list of chores to do.

"Start with the dishes, then sweep the floors and do the laundry," she instructs him.

David nods and sets to work. He's a bit clumsy at first, but soon gets into a rhythm.

Meanwhile, Ruth watches him with amusement. She can't believe how easy it is to manipulate him in his hypnotic state. She decides to have a bit of fun and starts playfully bossing him around.

"David, you missed a spot there. And make sure you fold those towels correctly, or I'll have to punish you," she says, giggling.

David obeys without question, not even noticing the absurdity of the things Ruth is telling him to do.

Ruth revels in her newfound power over her brother. She enjoys watching him scurry around the house, doing her bidding. She wonders how far she can push him, how much more she can make him do.

As the day wears on, Ruth gets more and more inventive with her commands. She has David dancing around the living room, singing nursery rhymes, and even painting her toenails.

David barely even protests. He's so deeply under Jeannette's spell that he's completely subservient to Ruth's whims.

Finally, the day comes to an end, and Jeannette returns to snap David out of his trance. Ruth sends him on his way, with a playful peck on the cheek and a promise to have him over again soon.

David leaves feeling a bit dazed and confused, but also strangely fulfilled. He's happy to have served his sister and pleased to have made her happy.

Ruth, on the other hand, is already plotting the next time she'll have Jeannette hypnotize him. She can't wait to see what other mischief she can make him get up to.
Ruth phones Jeannette.

Ruth picks up the phone and dials Jeannette's number. After a few rings, Jeannette answers.

"Hey Ruth, what's up?" Jeannette asks.

Ruth takes a deep breath and says, "I just wanted to thank you for using hypnosis on David. It was so much fun having him under my control."

Jeannette chuckles. "I'm glad you enjoyed it. Did he do everything you asked him to do?"

"Absolutely. He was like putty in my hands. I made him do all sorts of ridiculous things, and he never questioned me once," Ruth says with a grin.

Jeannette laughs again. "That's the power of hypnosis for you. I'm happy to do it again if you want."

Ruth's eyes light up. "Actually, I was hoping we could make it a regular thing. I want to see how far we can push him, how much more obedient he can be."

Jeannette hesitates but then says, "I don't know, Ruth. We have to be careful. Hypnosis can be dangerous if we're not careful."

Ruth sighs. "Come on, Jeannette. It's just a bit of harmless fun. I promise we won't do anything too crazy."

Jeannette considers this for a moment and then says, "Okay, but we have to be careful. And we can't do it too often. We don't want to mess with David's head too much."

Ruth grins. "Don't worry, I'll take good care of him. Thanks, Jeannette. You're the best."

Jeannette shakes her head, knowing that she's going to regret this decision but unable to resist Ruth's enthusiasm. "You're welcome, Ruth. But be careful, okay?"
Jeannette agrees to give David a trigger phrase that Ruth can use to drop him back into deep obedient trance whenever she wants.

Jeannette hesitates for a moment, but she knows how much Ruth enjoys being in control of her brother. She decides to go ahead and give her a trigger phrase to put David back into a deep obedient trance whenever she wants.

"Okay, Ruth. I'll give you a trigger phrase that you can use to drop David back into a deep hypnotic trance. Are you sure you can handle this?"

Ruth nods eagerly. "Absolutely. What's the phrase?"

Jeannette takes a deep breath and says, "The phrase is 'obey your sister.' Whenever you say that to David, he'll be instantly put into a deep hypnotic trance and will do whatever you tell him to do. But be careful, Ruth. This is a very powerful tool, and you need to use it responsibly."

Ruth grins, feeling a surge of excitement and power rush through her. "Don't worry, Jeannette. I'll be careful. Thank you so much for this."

Jeannette sighs, knowing that she's unleashed a monster, but unable to take back what she's done. "Just be careful, Ruth. And don't forget, hypnosis can be dangerous if you're not careful."

Ruth waves off Jeannette's warning and hangs up the phone. She can't wait to try out her new toy on David, to see how deep she can make him go, and how far she can push him.

Little does she know, the power she's been given comes with a price, and that she may soon find herself in over her head.

conversation.content: Indie guy Dave (26) has been conditioned by his overweight office colleague Pat (52) over several hypnotic sessions (to get him to agree at first, she told him it was a meditation thing) to believe he is inferior to Pat & that he should obey & be at her feet (which he doesn’t consciously remember). In this script (kinky), afterwork drinks: Dave sits, a little dazed, distracted by Pat’s sandalled feet, while his work colleagues are drinking wine, drunk & laughing. Time for Smug fat Pat to show off to astonished workmates.

INT. AFTERWORK BAR - EVENING

Dave sits at the bar, a bit dazed, staring absentmindedly at Pat's sandaled feet. The work colleagues around him are drinking wine, visibly tipsy and laughing loudly.

PAT
(grinning confidently)
So, Dave, what do you think about that new project I just completed?

DAVE
(distracted, looking at her feet)
Huh? Oh, yeah, it looked great, Pat. Good job.

The rest of the colleagues exchange glances, puzzled by Dave's strange behavior.

SARAH
(teasingly)
Dave, are you alright? You seem a little out of it tonight.

DAVE
(snapping out of his daze)
Oh, sorry, just lost in thought for a moment. Yeah, I'm good, guys.

Pat leans back in her chair, a smug grin plastered across her face.

PAT
(to the colleagues)
You know, I've been teaching Dave a little something outside of work. Something he's quite fond of, aren't you, Dave?

Dave shifts uncomfortably in his seat, aware that something is amiss but unable to put his finger on it.

COLIN
(raising an eyebrow)
What are you talking about, Pat?

Pat confidently crosses her legs, purposely brushing her sandaled foot against Dave's leg.

PAT
(seductively)
Well, let's just say Dave has learned a few lessons recently. Lessons about power dynamics, submission, and his place in this world.

The colleagues' jaws drop, unable to process what they're hearing.

SARAH
(disbelief)
You can't be serious, Pat. Dave, is this true?

DAVE
(confused, hesitating)
I... I don't know. I mean, Pat has been helping me with some personal stuff, but...

Pat cuts him off, her voice dripping with authority.

PAT
(mockingly)
Oh, Dave, don't be shy. Tell them how you feel when you're at my feet, how you crave my command.

Dave's face flushes with embarrassment and confusion.

DAVE
(whispering, barely audible)
I... obey.

The colleagues stare at Dave, stunned and uncomfortable. Sarah stands up, her face showing concern.

SARAH
(angry)
This is messed up, Pat! You can't take advantage of Dave like this!

Pat stands up, towering over Sarah with an air of superiority.

PAT
(confidently)
I haven't taken advantage of anyone. Dave here is just discovering his true desires, and he's lucky to have someone like me to guide him.

COLIN
(outraged)
Pat, this is unethical, and it's certainly not appropriate for the workplace.

Pat scoffs dismissively, undeterred by their disapproval.

PAT
(smugly)
Well, if you feel that way, it's your loss. Dave has never been happier since he embraced his inferiority.

Dave finally snaps out of his daze, a flicker of realization crossing his face.

DAVE
(defiantly)
No, that's not right. This isn't who I am. I won't let you manipulate me like this.

Dave stands up, his expression determined. The other colleagues rally behind him, showing their support.

SARAH
(firmly)
You got this, Dave. We're with you.

Slowly but surely, Dave begins to reclaim his confidence, shedding the effects of Pat's conditioning.

FADE OUT.

Hanna arranged to ‘lend’ her husband Danny to her brother George for the day, to do whatever George wanted. George opened the door in his shorts and flip-flops and told Danny to come round the back, to the garden.

Danny followed George obediently, still in his hypnotic trance, and couldn't even remember how he got there. In the garden, George had a deck chair set up and told Danny to sit down. George put on some relaxing music and began to speak softly to Danny, instructing him to relax even more deeply.

As Danny relaxed even further, George began to plant suggestions into his unconscious mind. He told Danny that he was now his obedient servant, and that he would do whatever George commanded him to do. Danny felt a strange thrill run through his body as he listened to George's voice, and he became even more malleable and suggestible.

Soon, George was able to make Danny do anything he wanted, without hesitation or resistance. He made Danny clean the pool, mow the lawn and even wash his car. Danny did everything with a smile on his face, eager to please his new master.

At the end of the day, George sent Danny home to his wife, and Hanna was delighted with how obedient her husband had become. She thanked George for hypnotizing Danny so effectively, and promised to repay the favor the next time he needed something.

And Danny? Well, Danny was just happy to be of service to his beloved wife and her family, and couldn't wait to be put under again.

Once upon a time in the quaint town of Los Santos, the notorious Michael De Santa and the unpredictable Trevor Philips found themselves in an unexpected situation. On this particular day, they had chosen to hang out at Michael's luxurious mansion, hoping to find some solace from their tumultuous lives.

As they sat on the comfortable couch, sipping beer and reminiscing about old times, Trevor couldn't help but notice Michael's melancholic expression. His dear friend seemed lost in his own thoughts, his eyes fixated on the grand mirror hanging in the living room. Worried about his friend, Trevor decided to reach out and lend a supportive hand, both literally and metaphorically.

Trevor rose to his feet and walked over to Michael, who still seemed lost in his thoughts. Gently placing his hands on Michael's broad shoulders, he asked, "Hey, Mikey, what's going on? You seem a little off today."

Startled by Trevor's presence, Michael turned to face him, a hint of vulnerability flickering in his eyes. "I don't know, Trevor," he admitted. "Lately, I've been feeling self-conscious about my weight. I'm not as fit as I used to be, and it's been bothering me."

Trevor, being the unconventional friend that he was, pondered for a moment before a mischievous grin crossed his face. "Well, Mikey, I know just the thing to cheer you up," he declared.

Curiosity sprouted in Michael's eyes as he watched Trevor make his way towards the mirror. With an air of confidence, Trevor positioned himself behind Michael, wrapping his arms around his friend's waist. The unexpected embrace caught Michael by surprise, his heart beating a little faster.

As Trevor's hands instinctively rested on Michael's chest, Michael's apprehension morphed into something entirely different. His breath hitched, and he felt an unfamiliar warmth pooling within him. It was a sudden realization that made his heart skip a beat - apparently, being touched by Trevor in that way was a turn-on for him.

Their eyes met in the reflection of the mirror, and a mixture of shock and excitement passed between them. Trevor, ever excellent at reading people, sensed the shift in atmosphere and released Michael from his embrace. Yet, the realization remained, lingering in the air like a well-kept secret.

They laughed nervously, attempting to brush off the sudden tension. "Well, that was unexpected," Michael chuckled, breaking the silence. "Who knew you had such a magical touch, Trevor?"

Trevor shrugged, his eyes glinting with a newfound curiosity. "Guess I have a gift for surprising you then, Mikey," he commented, trying to hide a mischievous grin.

Though the moment had taken them both off guard, it brought an unexpected closeness to their friendship. They discovered that even in the quirkiest ways, they could find solace and comfort in one another's presence. Michael's worries about his weight slowly faded into insignificance under the weight of their newfound camaraderie.

From that day forward, whenever Michael found himself feeling self-conscious, Trevor would offer a lingering touch on his chest, a simple reminder that he was supported and cherished. Their friendship grew stronger, built upon a foundation of understanding and trust, and they continued to navigate the wilds of Los Santos side by side, forever bound by the day a simple hug redefined what they meant to each other.

conversation.content: Write a Legend of Korra fanfiction where Korra and Kuvira are together but Korra frames Kuvira and turns evil

Title: Corrupted Harmony

Chapter 1: Unexpected Affections

Ever since the Harmonic Convergence, Republic City had been evolving into a more balanced world. With the threat of the Red Lotus extinguished, Avatar Korra focused on maintaining harmony and healing the wounds inflicted by decades of War. As time went on, Korra found solace in her newfound love interest, Kuvira, the once formidable leader of the Earth Empire.

Chapter 2: Fractured Trust

However, a dark seed of doubt and fear began to grow within Korra's mind. Whispers of Kuvira's past actions caused her unease, leading her to question the sincerity of their relationship. Consumed by these doubts, Korra resolved to prove her suspicions right, convinced she had to protect the world from a potential threat.

Chapter 3: The Frame-Up

Korra and Kuvira embarked on a perilous journey across the Earth Kingdom, overseeing various rebuilding projects. Korra used this opportunity to meticulously plan her deceit. Utilizing her mastery of the elements, she staged numerous incidents to frame Kuvira, making it look like she was attempting to reclaim her power and spread chaos.

Chapter 4: The Inquisition

As evidence mounted and eyewitness testimonies aligned against Kuvira, Korra confronted her love with claims and accusations, leaving Kuvira bewildered and heartbroken. The once-warm bond they shared now turned to ashes in the fiery aftermath of Korra's manipulation.

Chapter 5: The Fall

The world, desperate to avoid another uprising, mobilized against Kuvira. Chaos engulfed the Earth Kingdom as rumors spread about an impending coup led by Kuvira's secret followers. Korra, secretly reveling in the chaos she had created, exploited her status as Avatar to lead the charge against Kuvira, under the pretense of protecting the world from tyranny.

Chapter 6: Heart of Darkness

Kuvira, shattered by the betrayal, sought refuge in her solitude while grappling with her tarnished legacy. Facing a lifetime of imprisonment, she experienced a transformation of spirit, realizing that she had once again allowed her ambitions to jeopardize her future with Korra—destroying everything she had worked for.

Chapter 7: The Final Confrontation

As Republic City trembled under Korra's iron rule, her reign of terror reached its zenith. Determined to erase any traces of resistance, Korra devised a plan to publicly execute Kuvira—a spectacle meant to crush the hope of the Earth Kingdom and solidify her own power.

Chapter 8: Redemption and Rebirth

Just as Kuvira stood on the precipice of doom, a group of loyal friends and allies, aware of Korra's deception, intervened. Combining their skills, they confronted the Avatar to expose her cruel plan. The battle that ensued shook the foundations of the Spirit World and challenged the distorted reality Korra had created.

Chapter 9: Reconciling the Shadows

After an intense struggle, the truth was revealed — Korra's manipulation, framing, and descent into darkness stood exposed. Consumed by guilt and remorse, Korra sought redemption amidst the ruins of her once-proud reign. Kuvira, now free from her unjust accusations, pondered whether forgiveness was possible, extending a cautious hand towards the broken Avatar.

Chapter 10: A New Beginning

As Korra and Kuvira began the arduous process of rebuilding, they discovered that true strength lies not in bending elements or ruling with an iron fist but in the ability to heal wounds and foster unity. Together, they aimed to mend the shattered bonds of trust and create a better world in which love and compassion triumphed over fear and hatred.

In a world once torn apart by their intertwined destinies, Korra and Kuvira now embarked on a shared journey of redemption, determined to restore balance and harmony across the four nations and prove that even in darkness, the light could prevail.

Chapter 11: The Depths of Repentance

As the world began to heal from the devastating consequences of Korra's manipulation, the weight of her actions pressed heavily on her conscience. She retreated to the heart of the Spirit World, seeking guidance from the ancient spirits who had witnessed the depths of darkness and emerged with wisdom.

Meanwhile, Kuvira, devastated by the betrayal and the ensuing chaos, isolated herself deep within the mountains of the Earth Kingdom. The pain of losing Korra and the realization of her past misdeeds weighed her down, making every step feel like a burden.

Chapter 12: A Flicker of Hope

Korra, filled with remorse, embarked on a personal journey to find Kuvira and offer her repentance. Seeking enlightenment and redemption, she traversed treacherous landscapes and perilous spirit realms. With each step, her resolve to make amends strengthened, driven by the need to heal the wounds inflicted upon the woman she once loved.

Chapter 13: The Path to Redemption

After a lengthy and arduous journey, Korra finally found Kuvira in her secluded hiding spot. She approached her with caution, mindful of the pain she had caused. Tearfully, Korra confessed her guilt, acknowledging the irreversible damage she had done to Kuvira and their relationship. 

Understanding the weight of her own actions, Kuvira hesitated but ultimately allowed Korra to speak. She listened to the heartfelt apology, realizing that forgiveness could be a path to healing and redemption for both of them.

Chapter 14: Seeking Forgiveness

In the ensuing weeks, Korra and Kuvira engaged in intense discussions and soul-searching. Kuvira, harboring her own remorse for past actions, began to understand the depth of Korra's struggle and the extent of her own mistakes. They both recognized the importance of acknowledging their faults and making amends.

Guided by newfound humility and compassion, they devised a plan together. Korra proposed using their unique skills and insights to promote peace and foster reconciliation among the nations they had once inadvertently divided.

Chapter 15: Atonement's Trial

Korra's path to redemption led her to the realization that some actions required atonement. Recognizing the need for Kuvira to experience the consequences of her past actions, Korra proposed a plan that would allow Kuvira to serve her sentence through community service, using her knowledge and strength to help rebuild the towns and villages she had once threatened.

With a mixture of hope and trepidation, Kuvira accepted her punishment and vowed to make amends. Side by side, Korra and Kuvira began their joint effort to heal wounds and restore faith in a fractured Earth Kingdom.

Chapter 16: Rebuilding Together

As they worked tirelessly on reconstruction projects, Korra and Kuvira delved deeper into their own personal growth, learning to trust again and rebuilding the foundations of their friendship. Bound by shared guilt, they sought solace in each other's vulnerability, finding strength in their collective journey towards redemption.

Chapter 17: A Unifying Future

News of the Avatar and the former Dictator working together to rebuild shattered communities spread across the nations. People began to see the possibility of healing and unity, inspired by the unlikely partnership between Korra and Kuvira.

Their collaborative efforts became a symbol of hope—a testament that even those who had fallen to darkness could find the light within themselves. Together, they envisioned a future where forgiveness and compassion would serve as the pillars of a harmonious world.

Epilogue: Embracing the Shadows

In time, Korra and Kuvira's journey toward redemption transformed into a life-long commitment. As they continued to rebuild and foster peace, memories of the darkness served as a poignant reminder of the fragile nature of harmony. Their story became a cautionary tale and a testament to the resilience of the human spirit—inspiring future generations to embrace compassion, forgiveness, and the strength to navigate the shadows of one's past.

David's fingers gently press into the soles of Kevin's feet, slowly working out the tension from a day of relaxation. Despite his dazed state, David appears attentive to the task at hand as though it were the most important thing in the world. Kevin can't help but let out a contented sigh, feeling his muscles loosen under David's surprisingly skilled touch.

The room is quiet, save for the sound of Kevin's occasional sighs of satisfaction, with the air heavy as David's hypnosis-induced daze lingers around him. His hands methodically work their way around Kevin's feet, moving from the heels up to the balls of the feet, and then gently pulling on each toe, one by one. Kevin's smirk grows even wider as he finds enjoyment in the power he has over his brother-in-law, knowing full well this is a scene he'll likely share with Catherine later on.

David's focus remains on Kevin's feet, never once breaking his concentration, even though deep down, a small part of him feels the strangeness of the situation. Still, the hypnosis has its hold, and David carries on, the motions of the foot massage seeming almost robotic in their execution.

After several minutes, Kevin finally decides he's had enough, and instructs David to stop. David obliges, gently releasing Kevin's feet and lowering them to the floor. As Kevin smirks in satisfaction, David, still in a fog, remains kneeling for a moment, waiting for further instructions or the return to his normal state, whichever may come first.
The next time David bumps into Kevin, his brother-in-law gleefully reminds him of the time he had him submissively at his feet!

A few days later, David runs into Kevin at a local coffee shop. David, not aware of the events that transpired while he was under hypnosis, greets him with a warm smile.

David: Hey, Kevin! How's it going?

Kevin: (grinning) Oh, you know, can't complain. But, man, David, I just can't help but think about the other day when you were...well, I have to be honest, submissively at my feet! (laughs)

David: (looking confused) What are you talking about, Kevin?

Kevin: (taking a moment to decide whether to reveal the secret or not) You don't remember? Well, I guess I shouldn't be surprised. Let's just say you gave me an amazing foot massage, and you were completely dazed while doing it. It was quite the sight!

David, becoming increasingly concerned about the situation, frowns and tries to recall the memory, but nothing comes to his mind.

David: I...I don't remember any of that. Are you sure you're not joking?

Kevin: (smirking) Oh, I'm not joking. It was quite the experience for me. But don't worry, it's our little secret. Enjoy the rest of your day, David!

As Kevin walks away, David stands there, feeling perplexed and disturbed by the revelation. In the back of his mind, he begins to wonder if Catherine and Kevin have been playing him all along, using hypnosis to manipulate him for their own amusement. Only time will tell if David decides to confront his wife and brother-in-law about their secret arrangement, or maybe do some investigations of his own to uncover the truth.

conversation.content: In this long script, Dave willngly allowed his friend Gina to hypnotize him & now he’s totally under. Gina's told him to be a mindless footstool for her.Catherine (giggling) “You like just being a footstool, don’t you, Dave?”

Dave (in a monotone voice) "Yes, I enjoy being your mindless footstool, Gina."

Catherine (giggling) "Oh my, this is too good. Dave, what else can we make you do as a footstool?"

Dave (still in a monotone) "I am at your disposal, Gina. You may place your feet on me, use me as a resting platform, or whatever else you desire."

Catherine (laughing) "Oh, I can't believe this. Gina, you truly have power over him."

Gina (smirking) "Indeed, Catherine. Dave is completely under my control, and he finds pleasure in being submissive."

Dave (expressionless) "I find pleasure in fulfilling Gina's every command. Being her footstool brings me a sense of purpose and contentment."

Catherine (amused) "Well, I must say, Dave, you make an excellent footstool. Your obedience is quite admirable."

Gina (playfully) "I think it's time to test Dave's obedience even further. Dave, I want you to lick my shoes clean."

Dave (without hesitation) "Yes, Gina. I will gladly fulfill your request."

Catherine (bursting into laughter) "Oh wow, this is beyond anything I imagined. Dave, you're really something."

Gina (enjoying the power) "Dave, as you polish my shoes with your tongue, remember that your sole purpose is to serve me. You are my obedient footstool."

Dave (obediently) "Yes, Gina. I embrace my role as your footstool and will fulfill your desires."

Catherine (snickering) "I have to give it to you, Gina. You definitely know how to make the most of this hypnotism thing."

Gina (grinning) "Thank you, Catherine. It's all about exploring our fantasies and enjoying the power dynamics."

Dave (continuing to lick Gina's shoes) "I find great satisfaction in submitting to Gina's control. It brings me a sense of pleasure and fulfillment."

Catherine (still laughing) "Well, Dave, I guess you truly are a dedicated footstool. Enjoy your newfound purpose."

Gina (teasingly) "And remember, Dave, as long as you're under my spell, you'll continue to be my loyal footstool."

Dave (mindlessly) "Yes, Gina. I am your loyal footstool, ready to serve you in any way you desire."

Catherine (between laughter) "Alright, alright, you two. I think we've had enough footstool fun for today. Let's release Dave from his spell now."

Gina (smiling) "As you wish, Catherine. Dave, you are no longer under my control. Wake up from your trance."

Dave (slowly coming back to his senses) "Wha- What just happened? Why am I on the floor?"

Catherine (still chuckling) "Oh, Dave, you were just being Gina's obedient footstool. It was all in good fun."

Dave (blushing) "Wow, I can't believe I did all that. Being hypnotized really messes with your head."

Gina (grinning) "It was quite the experience, wasn't it? I'm glad you were willing to try it out."

Dave (nervously) "Yeah, definitely an interesting experience. Let's just say I won't be volunteering as a footstool again anytime soon."

Catherine (laughing) "Fair enough, Dave. You've had your fair share of footstool adventures for now. But who knows what other fun we might have in the future."

Dave (raising an eyebrow) "I think I'll pass on any future mind control experiments. Let's stick to more conventional activities, shall we?"

Gina (playfully) "Oh, come on, Dave. Where's your sense of adventure? You never know what you might enjoy until you try it."

Dave (smiling) "I suppose you have a point there, Gina. Just promise me no more footstool shenanigans, alright?"

Catherine (still giggling) "No more footstool escapades, I promise. We'll find something equally exciting and less... humiliating."

Dave (relieved) "Thank you, Catherine. I appreciate that. Let's just enjoy our time together without any mind control tricks."

Gina (mischievously) "Oh, don't worry, Dave. I'm sure we'll find some other way to have fun. Maybe a game night or a movie marathon?"

Dave (grinning) "That sounds perfect, Gina. Count me in for a relaxing, mind-control-free evening."

Catherine (smiling) "Alright, let's leave the hypnosis dramas behind and focus on having a wonderful time together. No more footstool talk, agreed?"

All (together) "Agreed!"

conversation.content: In this long script, much older workmate Kezia cleverly talks Dan down into a suggestible trance using hypnotic language and tone, without mentioning hypnosis & without Dan realizing it’s happening. She then suggests that from now on he enjoys following Kezia’s commands & tests this by demanding a foot massage. He complies in a daze & she revels in his subservience.

INT. OFFICE - DAY

Dan, a young and naïve office worker, sits at his desk diligently working. Kezia, a seasoned employee known for her cunning ways, approaches him.

KEZIA
(intimate and soothing tone)
Hey Dan, you seem a little stressed. Do you mind if I chat with you for a while?

DAN
(slightly surprised)
Uh, sure Kezia. What's on your mind?

Kezia pulls up a chair next to Dan, maintaining an air of calm authority.

KEZIA
(close to Dan's ear)
You know, Dan, sometimes our minds can be overwhelmed with thoughts and tension. It's important to find ways to relax and let go. Would you like to try an exercise with me?

Dan, unknowingly under the spell of Kezia's persuasive tone, nods hesitantly.

DAN
(slightly intrigued)
Okay, Kezia. What kind of exercise are we talking about?

Kezia gently places her hand on Dan's shoulder, exerting a subtle command.

KEZIA
(softly)
Just listen carefully to my words, Dan. Imagine yourself in a soothing place, a place of pure tranquility. Let your body and mind unwind, focusing only on my voice.

As Kezia continues to speak, she weaves hypnotic language into her dialogue, captivating Dan's attention.

KEZIA (CONT'D)
(dreamy)
As you relax deeper, you find yourself feeling a profound connection with me, Dan. Like a loyal companion, you trust my words completely, finding comfort in my commands.

Dan's eyes glaze over slightly, a sign that he is succumbing to Kezia's subtle influence.

DAN
(muffled)
I... I trust you, Kezia.

Kezia smiles triumphantly before moving on to the next phase of her plan.

KEZIA
(confidently)
Now that you're in this deep state of relaxation, Dan, you'll discover a newfound joy in obeying my requests. It's as if my words hold power over you, igniting a desire to fulfill my wishes.

Dan, still in a euphoric daze, nods obediently.

DAN
(slowly)
I... I want to fulfill your wishes, Kezia.

Kezia's face lights up with excitement, her plan working flawlessly.

KEZIA
(teasingly)
Well, then, Dan, how about giving me a foot massage? I've been on my feet all day, and I'm sure my tired soles could use some attention.

Without hesitation, Dan starts massaging Kezia's feet, his actions automatic and submissive.

KEZIA (CONT'D)
(enjoying the moment)
That's it, Dan. Just focus on the sensation of your hands on my feet. Feel the pleasure of fulfilling my request. From now on, you'll always be ready and willing to obey me.

Dan continues massaging, completely unaware of Kezia's manipulation.

FADE OUT.

conversation.content: As the days went by, David enjoyed working at Stella’s cafe. She offered to hypnotize him each morning before the doors opened, and soon he was extremely conditioned and easy to drop into a suggestible and submissive trance with a word or a finger snap from Stella. One warm day, the cafe was almost empty when one of David’s friends, Victoria, popped in to say hello to him at work, and get a cuppa. (When she realizes the two are friends, Stella can’t help coming over to interrupt by introducing herself and and showing off how easily she can drop David into dazed submission in front of Victoria, his friend)

David could feel himself slipping into a trance, his body becoming limp and relaxed as Stella snapped her fingers. He could hear her voice in the background, but it was distant, like a murmur from another room.

When he opened his eyes, he saw Victoria standing in front of him with a concerned look on her face.

"David, are you okay?" she asked, placing a hand on his shoulder.

David shook his head, trying to clear the fog in his mind. "Yeah, sorry. I just… lost track of time."

Stella smiled at him indulgently. "It happens to all of my little pets sometimes. Don't worry, David, I'll take care of you."

David felt a stab of embarrassment and confusion. Was he really Stella's pet? Was he okay with that?

Victoria looked between them, her eyes widening in concern. "Stella, what's going on here?" she asked, suspicion creeping into her voice.

Stella laughed, her eyes glittering with amusement. "Oh, nothing dear. David here is just under my spell. Don't worry, he's perfectly happy."

David felt a flush of heat spread over his cheeks, humiliated at being caught in such a state. He tried to sit up straighter, to assert himself, but found he couldn't move.

Stella leaned in close, her lips brushing against his ear. "Relax, David. It's all going to be okay. You're safe with me."

David closed his eyes, feeling a strange mixture of fear and excitement wash over him. He knew he should resist, but the sensation of being under Stella's control was too powerful to ignore.

Victoria watched them both, her expression stricken. "David, we need to go. This isn't right. You're not yourself."

Stella tilted her head, a predatory smile on her lips. "Oh, but he is himself. This is the real David, the one he was always meant to be. Isn't that right, my darling?"

David felt a surge of pleasure at being called 'darling', but his heart was pounding with panic. He knew he needed to get away from Stella, to break her hold over him.

"I… I don't know," he stammered, his mind racing.

Victoria grabbed his arm and pulled him up from the chair. "Come on, David. This isn't healthy. We can talk about it later, when you're feeling more like yourself."

Stella watched them leave with a smug smile, her gaze following David all the way out the door. She knew he would be back, eventually. They always came back.

conversation.content:
David works at Sandra’s cafe. Sandra (in her mid-fifties) has been hypnotizing David, always making him completely forget that it happened. David doesn’t even know he’s ever been hypnotized at all.

One hot summer day, the cafe was almost empty when one of David’s best friends, Jenny (in her twenties, overweight, sandals and red toenails), popped in to say hello and get a cold drink. When she realizes the two are friends, Sandra thinks it might please Jenny to see how easily her friend can be made to become an utterly hypnotized slave right there in front of her, and she comes over to join their conversation.

“You two know each other?” she smiles.

David nods, “Yeah, Jenny and I went to school together.”

Sandra’s eyes narrow slightly as she looks at Jenny, “Can I ask you something, Jenny?” 

Jenny nods, sipping on her drink. 

“Do you trust me?” Sandra asks, her tone light and friendly.

Jenny blinks, somewhat taken aback, “Uh, sure, I guess.”

“Great,” Sandra says, “then you won’t mind if I give David a little demonstration.” 

Jenny furrows her brows, “Demonstration of what?”

Sandra leans in closer to them, “Just watch.” 

She places her hand on David’s shoulder, and within seconds the young man’s eyes glaze over, a blank, empty expression on his face. He stands up from the table, straight as a rod, and Sandra begins to give him simple commands. 

“David, go fetch me a glass of water,” she says.

David doesn’t reply but immediately heads to the kitchen. Sandra turns to Jenny, “See what I mean?”

Jenny is utterly shocked, “What did you do to him?”

Sandra shrugs, “Just a little trick I learned a long time ago.” 

Jenny wants to be angry, but she can’t take her eyes off David. When he returns with the water, Sandra dismisses him and he goes back to his work like nothing ever happened. 

Jenny leaves the cafe feeling deeply unsettled, and she can’t shake the feeling that something deeply wrong is going on there. She makes a mental note to talk to David later, but she has no idea where to even start.

Sandra nods. “Yeah, it’s been a slow week.”

Jen takes a sip of her drink, then suddenly giggles, pointing at David. “Hey, David, your face is funny!

David suddenly looks confused, like he’s trying to remember something. Sandra sees her chance to hypnotize him again with Jen as a witness.

“David, focus on my voice,” Sandra says softly. “You’re going to feel a wave of relaxation come over you, and you’ll do everything I say without question.”

David’s eyes glaze over as he listens to Sandra’s words, completely unaware of Jen watching with fascination.

“David, stand up and come over here,” Sandra commands.

David stands up, looking dazed, and walks over to Sandra.

“Now, David, from this moment on, you’re going to be my submissive slave,” Sandra says, her voice taking on a seductive tone. “You’ll do anything I ask without question.”

David just nods obediently, completely under Sandra’s control. Jen watches in amazement as David starts to do whatever Sandra asks, even as she laughs at his expense.

“David, what are you doing?” Jen asks, starting to laugh even harder.

Sandra just smiles wickedly at Jen’s reaction. “I’ve hypnotized him, Jen,” Sandra says. “He’s completely under my control.”

Jen’s eyes widen as she looks at David, now helpless and obedient to Sandra’s every whim.

“David, how do you feel?” Jen asks, still laughing.

David just nods blankly. “I feel good,” he says in a monotone voice.

Jen can’t stop laughing as she watches David do Sandra’s bidding, amazed at how quickly and effectively Sandra has hypnotized him. Sandra just smiles, enjoying the power she has over the formerly confident and in-control David.

conversation.content:
(Sandra’s going to hypnotize David right in front of his friend. Jen will react with laughter & concealed arousal at seeing him become utterly submissively obedient to Sandra)

David works at Sandra’s cafe. Sandra has been hypnotizing David, always making him completely forget that it happened. David doesn’t even know he’s ever been hypnotized at all.

One summer day, the cafe was almost empty when one of David’s best friends, Jen, popped in to say hello to him at work and get a cold drink.

“You two know each other?" she smiles. “I’m Sandra.”

Sandra greets Jen with a warm smile and welcomes her to the cafe. As Jen chats with David, Sandra takes a moment to observe their interaction, studying David’s body language and tone of voice.

Suddenly, Sandra has an idea. With a flick of her wrist, Sandra discreetly triggers the hypnotic trigger word she’s been conditioning David to respond to.

In an instant, David’s eyes go blank, his posturing becomes eerily still and his voice takes on a robotic cadence.

“David, please go to the back room and start cleaning the floors,” Sandra commands him, almost absent-mindedly.

“Of course, Sandra,” David replies mechanically, without a hint of resistance in his tone. Without a second thought, he promptly heads to the back room to start sweeping the floors.

Jen watches in utter shock as her friend obediently follows Sandra's orders. She bursts into laughter but deep down, she can’t help feeling aroused at seeing David so controlled and submissive.

As Sandra snaps her fingers again, releasing David from his trance, David returns to his normal self, looking around the room with a look of confusion.

Jen can't wait to come back to the cafe and watch Sandra work her hypnotic magic again.

(Sandra’s going to hypnotize David right in front of his friend. She's going to tell Jen that she often makes David massage her feet while he's under)

David works at Sandra’s cafe. Sandra has been hypnotizing David, always making him completely forget that it happened. David doesn’t even know he’s ever been hypnotized at all.

One summer day, the cafe was almost empty when one of David’s best friends, Jen, popped in to say hello to him at work and get a cold drink. (she's wearing flip-flops in the heat)

“You two know each other?" she smiles. “I’m Sandra.”

“Yeah, we’ve been friends for years,” David replies.

Sandra has an idea. She’s been meaning to test out her new hypnosis skills on David, and what better audience than his friend?

“David, would you be willing to participate in a little experiment for me?” Sandra asks, batting her eyelashes.

“Sure, what kind of experiment?” David asks, intrigued.

“I’m going to hypnotize you, and you’re going to do something for me while you’re under,” Sandra explains.

David nods, still curious.

Jen watches with fascination as Sandra pulls out a pocket watch and starts swinging it back and forth in front of David’s eyes.

“Your eyes are getting heavy… you’re feeling very relaxed…” Sandra’s words are soft and soothing.

Before long, David is completely under Sandra’s spell.

“David, in a moment, I’m going to snap my fingers and wake you up. But when you wake up, you will feel compelled to massage my feet. You won’t remember being hypnotized, but you’ll know that you want to make me happy by massaging my feet.”

Sandra snaps her fingers, and David blinks, looking around confused.

“Hey, that was weird… what happened?” he asks.

“Oh, nothing, dear,” Sandra says sweetly. “I just wanted to test out my hypnosis skills on you.”

Jen looks skeptical, but David seems unfazed.

“Do you mind if I take a seat?” Sandra asks Jen, pointing to the empty chair across from her.

“Sure, go ahead,” Jen says.

Sandra sits down, crossing her legs and placing her feet on the seat next to her.

“David, why don’t you come give me a foot massage?” she says, batting her eyelashes again.

David’s eyes light up, and he eagerly takes off her flip-flops and starts rubbing her feet.

Jen watches in shock, completely amazed that David is doing this willingly.

After a few minutes, Sandra snaps her fingers again, waking David up.

“Wow, David, you’re an amazing masseuse,” Sandra says, slipping her flip-flops back on. “Thanks for the great foot massage.”

David looks confused again, as if the entire thing never happened.

“Did I just give you a foot massage?” he asks.

“Yes, you did,” Sandra says, grinning.

Jen can’t believe what she just witnessed.

“That was incredible… how did you do that?” she asks Sandra.

“Oh, it’s just a little trick I learned,” Sandra shrugs, acting as if it’s no big deal.

Jen leaves the cafe, still thinking about what she just saw. She can’t help but wonder what other secrets her old friend David is keeping from her.

conversation.content:
(David’s colleague Clare embarrassingly hypnotizes him, giving him suggestions to make him even more susceptible to hypnosis in the future, implanting a ‘deep sleep’ trigger, but he has no memory of that. It starts when, despite neither of them even believing hypnosis is real, he accidentally really does go under when she is just joking around and pretending, to her astonishment and glee)

Most of the team from the office were on the night out to celebrate David’s 30th birthday. They had been at the pub for an hour already and people were starting to get tipsy. Clare slipped her pretty feet out of her strappy sandals.

She was feeling relaxed and in a playful mood. They were all laughing and joking, reminiscing about past work trips and shared experiences. David was enjoying himself too. He had been working hard for the last few months and it was good to let his hair down. 

Clare leaned in and whispered to David, “You know I’ve always wanted to hypnotize someone.” She giggled and took another sip of her drink. David raised an eyebrow, “Do you even believe in hypnosis?” Clare shook her head, “Not really, but it’s worth a try.” She laughed again, feeling bold and adventurous. 

David didn’t take her seriously, but he was intrigued. “Okay, go ahead and try.” Clare looked around, making sure no one was paying attention to them, and took a deep breath. “Okay, David, just relax. Keep your focus on me.” She swayed her hand in front of his face, mimicking what she had seen on TV. 

To her surprise, David’s eyes followed her hand and his breathing slowed down. Clare was stunned. She had expected David to laugh it off or play along, not actually go under. She tried a few simple suggestions, making him cluck like a chicken and act like a robot. The rest of the team were laughing and cheering them on. 

But Clare saw an opportunity. She whispered into David’s ear, “From now on, whenever you hear me say the word ‘deep sleep’, you will immediately feel drowsy and fall into a deep trance. You will be even more susceptible to hypnosis from now on.” David had no memory of this, but Clare knew she had implanted a powerful suggestion. 

They all left the pub together, still buzzing from the fun they had had. David was feeling a bit woozy, but he attributed it to the alcohol. Clare was looking forward to testing out her new ‘deep sleep’ trigger on David in the future. She loved the feeling of power it gave her, and she couldn’t wait to see just how far she could take it.

rewrite this, but set it in 13th century Genoa, with appropriate changes

Most of the merchants from the Genoese trading guild were celebrating the successful end of a long voyage. They had been at a tavern for a few hours already, with goblets of wine on the table and a boisterous atmosphere surrounding them. Clare removed her shoes, feeling the cool floor under her feet. She was in a playful mood tonight and her companions were already a little tipsy. 

Leaning towards David, she whispered, "I've always been curious about this art of hypnosis. Do you believe in its power?" David raised his bushy eyebrow and chuckled, "I'd be surprised if such a thing really exists." The Genoese merchants were known for their hearty skepticism. 

"Let me try anyway," Clare insisted, swishing a hand in front of David's face as she had seen travelling merchants do in Persia. To her astonishment, David's eyes followed her hand and he fell into a deep trance. 

The other merchants were amazed and Clare found a newfound power in her ability to influence others. She whispered to David, "From now on, when you hear me say 'sleep deeply,' you will become instantly drowsy and fall into a trance, becoming more susceptible to hypnosis henceforth". David had no memory of this and Clare knew she had implanted a powerful suggestion that could be used for many years to come.

As they left the tavern laughing and joking, David swayed a little, his words slurring. Clare suspected the wine had weakened any defenses he may have had. She looked forward to testing her new "sleep deeply" trigger on David in the future, and perhaps on some of the other skeptical merchants too. It was a source of pride for the curious and adventurous Clare, who had uncovered a hidden power within herself.

conversation.content: (David’s sister Ruth sometimes uses hypnosis on him) Ruth has made an arrangement with a friend of hers, Gina, to send her brother David over to Gina’s house do Gina’s bidding for the evening. David is a fairly docile guy and is willing to do whatever Ruth wants. In a daze, he rings the bell, and Emma opens the door, smirking, wearing a hoodie, jeans and bare feet.

"Hey there, David," Emma says, her tone teasing. "Ruth sent you over, didn't she?"

David nods slowly, still in a trance-like state from Ruth's hypnosis.

"Well, come on in then," Emma says, stepping aside to let him in.

David follows her into the living room, where Gina is waiting, sitting on the couch. She looks up as they enter and gives David a sly smile.

"Welcome, David," she says. "Ruth told me that you're here to do whatever I want. Is that right?"

David nods again, his mind still under Ruth's control.

"Good," Gina says. "I have a few things in mind for you. But first, let's get you out of those clothes."

David looks confused, but doesn't resist as Gina stands up and starts unbuttoning his shirt. Emma watches with interest, leaning against the wall and sipping a glass of wine.

Within minutes, David is standing in the living room wearing nothing but his boxers. Gina circles him, inspecting him from all angles.

"I have to say, David, your sister did a pretty good job with the hypnosis," she says. "You're so obedient and compliant. It's really quite impressive."

David just stares blankly at her, waiting for her next command.

"Okay," Gina says after a moment. "Here's what's going to happen. I want you to clean my entire house. Sweep, mop, vacuum, dust, do the dishes, everything. And I want you to do it all wearing nothing but your underwear."

David's eyes widen in shock, but he still doesn't protest.

"Understand?"

"Yes," he says in a monotone voice.

"Good," Gina says, handing him a broom. "Get to work."

David spends the next several hours cleaning Gina's house, completely naked except for his underwear. Emma watches him the whole time, occasionally offering him a sip of water or a piece of fruit, but otherwise just observing.

Finally, after what feels like an eternity, David finishes the last dish and collapses onto the couch, exhausted.

"Well done, David," Gina says, clapping him on the back. "You did a great job. And now, for your reward."

She reaches into her pocket and pulls out a small black remote.

"Ruth told me all about your little secret, David," she says, pressing a button on the remote. "And I have to say, I'm quite intrigued."

Suddenly, David feels a buzzing sensation in his underwear. He jumps up, his eyes widening in shock and embarrassment.

"What the hell?!" he stammers.

Emma and Gina burst out laughing, and David realizes that he's been had. Ruth had sent him over here as a prank, and they had taken full advantage of his hypnotized state.

He quickly gathers up his clothes and hurries out of the house, humiliated and confused.

But somewhere deep down, a small part of him wonders if maybe, just maybe, he might enjoy this kind of thing, if only he could do it on his own terms.

Dan is rational, intelligent, firm in his beliefs. He dislikes feet, thinking they’re gross. He believes he has never been hypnotized. Actually, he is very very susceptible to hypnosis and has been hypnotized many times before by his friends, who enjoy seeing him become a humiliated foot slave.

It was a warm day in April and Dan was at the mall. He had to buy some new gear for the upcoming university term, but right now he was sitting drinking a coffee under a plastic plant, watching the world go by.

As he sipped his coffee, a man in a bowler hat appeared in front of him.

"Excuse me, sir. I'm conducting a survey on people's attitudes towards feet. Would you mind answering a few questions?" the man asked.

Dan frowned but decided to answer the questions to be polite.

"Do you find feet attractive?" the man asked.

"No, I think they're gross," Dan answered.

"Do you think they can be hypnotic?"

Dan scoffed. "No, of course not. I've never been hypnotized in my life."

The man smiled knowingly and pulled out a pocket watch. "Actually, I think you're more susceptible to hypnotism than you believe. Would you like to test this theory?"

Dan rolled his eyes, thinking it was a waste of time, but something about the man's confident demeanor intrigued him.

"Fine, go ahead and try," Dan said.

The man started swinging the pocket watch back and forth, and Dan felt himself becoming drawn in by the movement. Gradually, his eyes felt heavy, and he had an overwhelming urge to close them.

"Listen to my voice, Dan. You're feeling very relaxed and open to suggestion. Feet are not gross. In fact, they are deeply arousing to you. You love to worship feet and are eager to serve anyone who presents them to you."

Dan tried to shake his head and resist the hypnotism, but his mind was already in a trance-like state.

"Yes, feet are sensual and erotic. I can't resist them," Dan repeated mindlessly.

The man snapped his fingers, and Dan suddenly felt awake again, but his thoughts were muddled. He couldn't remember what had just happened, but he felt drawn to a woman walking past with sandals.

"Excuse me, miss, may I massage your feet?" he asked without any conscious thought.

The woman looked confused but amused and let him take off her sandals to work his magic on her feet.

Dan didn't know why he was doing this, but he felt an overwhelming urge to please her and make her feel good. The sensation of her bare feet in his hands was peculiar and yet oddly satisfying.

Dan had been hypnotized again and was now a willing foot slave. He was embarrassed but also curious about what else could happen to him under hypnosis.
