Most of the team from the office were on the night out to celebrate David’s 30th birthday. They had been at the pub for an hour already and people were starting to get tipsy. Clare kicked her shoes off.

"David, come here for a second, I want to show you something," she said, gesturing for him to come closer. David obliged, not suspecting anything. As he approached, he realized that Clare was holding a small object in her hand - some kind of pendant that glowed gently in the dim light of the pub.

"Look into the pendant, David," Clare whispered softly. "Just let yourself relax and focus on the light. Listen to my voice. You're feeling very calm and peaceful, and every time you see this pendant, you'll remember this feeling."

David found himself unable to look away from the pendant, as though he was being drawn into it. Clare's voice sounded distant and far away, like it was coming from another room. He felt a strange sensation of floating in mid-air, weightless and unmoored.

As Clare spoke, she implanted suggestions into David's mind: that he would be more easily hypnotized in the future, that he would be able to go under in an instant. She reinforced these suggestions with every word, repeating them slowly, carefully, until they were firmly ingrained in his psyche.

By the time Clare finished, David was deeply under. He was staring blankly ahead, his pupils dilated and his body slack. Clare grinned mischievously, knowing that David would be her perfect subject from now on.

"And now, David, every time you hear me say 'Sleep now,' you will instantly fall into a deep and peaceful slumber. You'll find that you can't resist my command, and it will feel incredibly natural and effortless for you to do so."

Clare had no doubt that her suggestion would work flawlessly. David was already so deeply hypnotized that her voice had become a trigger for him. She repeated the phrase "Sleep now" a few more times, just to reinforce it in his subconscious.

(David’s colleague Clare hypnotizes him, giving him suggestions to make him even more susceptible to hypnosis in the future, implanting a ‘slave boy’ trigger, but he has no memory of that. It starts when, despite neither of them even believing hypnosis is real, he accidentally really does go under when she is just joking around and pretending, to her astonishment and glee)

Most of the team from the office were on the night out to celebrate David’s 30th birthday. They had been at the pub for an hour already and people were starting to get tipsy. Clare slipped the strappy sandals off her feet.

Her toes were starting to ache from standing all day. She noticed David sitting at the end of the table, looking a bit bored. She decided to liven things up a bit. 

“Hey, David,” she said, “I know you don’t believe in hypnosis, but let me try to hypnotize you anyway. Just for laughs.”

David rolled his eyes but was a good sport. “Sure, go ahead.”

Clare took a deep breath and began. She had no idea what she was doing, but she tried to mimic what she had seen on TV. She swung a pendulum watch back and forth in front of his eyes.

“Look into my eyes,” she said. “You are getting very sleepy.”

To her surprise, David started to look dazed and began to slump in his chair. She had never seen him like this before. 

“David, can you hear me?” she asked.

“Yes,” he mumbled.

“Good,” she said. “When you wake up, you will be even more susceptible to hypnosis in the future. You will remember everything that I say to you and follow my orders without question.”

David’s eyes fluttered closed and he fell into a deep sleep. Clare took the opportunity to implant more suggestions in his subconscious mind. She couldn’t believe that she was actually able to hypnotize him. It was like something out of a dream.

After a few minutes, David woke up, blinking. He looked around, confused.

“What just happened?” he asked.

Clare chuckled. “You went under hypnosis. You were a good subject too.”

David laughed uneasily. “I don’t remember anything.”

“That’s okay,” Clare said in a soothing voice. “You’ll remember from now on. Every time I say ‘slave boy’, you will become my slave. You’ll do everything I ask without question.”

David looked alarmed. “What? No, that’s not funny.”

Clare grinned wickedly. “Oh, don’t worry. It’s just a joke. It’s not like it will ever come up again.”

But she knew better. Clare was now the only one who could control David with her words. The thought made her feel a sense of power that she had never experienced before. She couldn’t wait to use it.

conversation.content:
(David’s boss at the cafe, Stella, hypnotizes him for fun & he doesn't even realize. She'd like to put him under in front of someone else)

On a very hot July afternoon, the cafe was pretty quiet. David was just refilling the fridge when the door opened and in came a good friend of his he hadn’t seen for a while.

“Victoria! How are you?”

David exclaimed, giving her a warm hug.

“I’m good, thanks! How’s work been?”

“Not too bad, just a bit slow today. But it’s always good to see a friendly face,” David replied with a smile.

Just then, Stella walked in from the back room.

“Well, hello there! I haven’t seen you in ages, Victoria! How have you been?” Stella asked, greeting Victoria with a hug.

“I’ve been great, thanks. How about you?”

“I can’t complain. Just keeping busy running this place,” Stella replied.

As they chatted, Stella looked over at David and got an idea.

“Hey David, do you mind if I practice my hypnotism on you? I’ve been reading up on it and I think I’m getting pretty good.”

David shrugged. “Sure, why not? I’ve never been hypnotized before.”

Stella grinned and began to swing a pocket watch back and forth in front of David’s eyes.

“Just relax and focus on the watch,” she instructed.

David stared intently at the watch as it moved back and forth.

“Your eyelids are getting heavy, David. You’re getting more and more relaxed,” Stella said in a soothing voice.

Victoria watched with interest as David’s eyes grew heavy and he slumped slightly in his chair.

“Now, David, whenever I snap my fingers, you’ll cluck like a chicken,” Stella said with a laugh.

She snapped her fingers and David suddenly let out a loud, “Cluck, cluck, cluck!”

Victoria burst out laughing as David looked around in confusion.

“What just happened?” he asked, bewildered.

Stella explained and David couldn’t believe he had been hypnotized without even realizing it.

“That’s crazy! I didn’t even feel different,” he exclaimed.

Stella grinned. “I told you I was getting good.”

Victoria looked impressed. “That was pretty amazing.”

Stella continued to practice her hypnotism on David, making him do various silly actions like singing nursery rhymes and hopping on one foot.

As they continued to have fun, Stella wondered who else she could hypnotize in front of David. She couldn’t wait to see his reaction.

On a very hot July afternoon (sandal weather), the cafe was pretty quiet. David was just refilling the fridge when the door opened and in came a good friend of his he hadn’t seen for a while. (Stella doesn't know her)

“Victoria! How are you?”

David exclaimed happily, putting a hand on her shoulder.

Victoria smiled and hugged him. “I’m good, thanks. How about you? Stella treating you well here?”

David nodded. “Yeah, she’s great.”

Stella, who had been wiping the counter nearby, approached them. “Hi, I’m Stella. You must be Victoria.”

Victoria shook her hand. “Yes, I am.”

Stella smiled warmly. “David talks about you all the time. He’s been wanting you to come by for a coffee or something.”

David felt a little embarrassed, but also pleased to hear Stella speak highly of him to his friend.

Victoria grinned. “Well, I’m here now.”

They chatted for a while longer, with Stella occasionally interjecting with small talk. Eventually, Stella suggested that David take a break and join them at a table.

“Actually, before you go,” Stella said, turning to David. “Can you grab me that book from the shelf?”

David nodded and walked over to the shelf on the other side of the room.

Stella turned to Victoria and leaned in, lowering her voice. “Watch this. It’s kind of funny.”

Victoria raised an eyebrow in confusion, but didn’t say anything as they both watched David grab the book from the shelf and start walking back towards them.

“David,” Stella said, her voice soft and husky. “You’re getting very, very sleepy.”

David’s eyes widened in surprise, but then they slowly drooped as he gazed at Stella. Victoria watched in amazement as David’s steps faltered and he leaned heavily on the nearest table for support.

Stella grinned at Victoria. “See? Told you it was funny.”

As David slipped deeper into trance, Stella murmured more commands to him. “You don’t remember anything we’ve spoken about today. You’ll only remember waking up from a restful nap.”

Victoria gaped as David obediently nodded at Stella’s words, a blank expression on his face. She had never seen anything like this before.

Stella, still grinning, snapped her fingers in front of David’s face. “Wake up, tiger.”

David blinked and shook his head, coming out of his trance. “Uh, sorry. What were we talking about again?”

Stella and Victoria exchanged a look, the former pleased with her little display of power, the latter still somewhat shocked.

“Oh, we were just chatting,” Stella said smoothly. “You should take a break and join us. Victoria and I were just talking about her new job.”

David nodded, looking slightly dazed as he made his way to the table. As they settled in to chat, Victoria couldn’t help but glance over at Stella with a newfound sense of wariness. What other secrets was she hiding?

conversation.content: (David’s wife Catherine sometimes uses hypnosis on him) Catherine has made an arrangement with her brother, Kevin, to send her husband David over to do Kevin's housework for him, and anything else he might tell him to do. David is a fairly docile guy and is willing to do whatever Catherine wants. In a daze, he knocks, and Kevin opens the door, smirking, wearing a vest, jeans and bare feet.

"Hey, David. Come on in," Kevin says, motioning for him to enter.

David steps inside and looks around, noticing the mess and clutter in the living room. He feels a little overwhelmed, but knows he's here to do whatever Kevin wants.

"Alright, Kevin. What do you need me to do?" David asks.

Kevin grins, enjoying the power dynamic at play. "Well, let's start with cleaning up this living room. And while you do that, how about you take off your shirt? It's hot in here."

David obeys, feeling a sense of discomfort as he takes off his shirt and begins picking up trash and putting away dishes. Kevin watches him closely, occasionally giving him tasks to do, always making sure to throw in a little humiliation or power play. David is so deep in a trance that he doesn't question any of it.

After a few hours, Kevin dismisses David, a satisfied smirk on his face. David leaves in a daze, having no memory of what just happened. Catherine will ask him later if he completed Kevin's chores, and David will assure her that he did, never realizing how manipulated and controlled he was while under hypnosis.

David is a fairly docile guy and is willing to do whatever Jeannette wants. In a daze, he knocks, and his sister Ruth opens the door in her bare feet, smirking and clearly delighted to have her brother in her power.

As David enters the house, Jeannette snaps her fingers and gives him a suggestion to obey Ruth's every command. David feels a strange sense of submission as he watches Ruth direct him to clean the dishes, vacuum the carpets, and even sweep the floors. He is completely under her control, unable to resist her commands no matter how degrading or humiliating they may be.

Jeannette watches from the sidelines, enjoying the power that her hypnosis has given her over David. She even encourages Ruth to make David do even more, pushing the boundaries of what he is willing to comply with. The more Ruth demands of him, the deeper David sinks into a hypnotic trance, losing all sense of his own identity and will.

Days later, David wakes up from what feels like a long, dreamless sleep. He has no memory of the time he spent doing Ruth's bidding, but he feels worn out and drained, as if he's been working for weeks on end. It takes him a while to realize what has happened, but when he does, he feels violated and angry.

Jeannette tries to apologize and explain her actions, but David cuts her off, telling her he never wants to see her again. He knows that what she did was wrong and that he can never fully trust her again. As for Ruth, he decides to confront her and make her feel the same fear and powerlessness he felt under her control. He vows to never let anyone control him like that again, no matter what.

David and Ruth are at their parents' house for Sunday lunch.

As they sit down for Sunday lunch, David can't help but feel a sense of unease. He knows that Ruth has the power to hypnotize him at any moment, and he's not sure he wants to give her that kind of control over him.

Ruth, however, seems to be enjoying herself immensely. She keeps giving David subtle commands, making him pour her drinks and passing her dishes. David obeys without question, even though he can feel his resistance slipping away with each passing moment.

Their parents seem oblivious to what's going on, chatting away and enjoying their meal. It's almost a relief for David, as he can at least escape from Ruth's hold for a little while.

But then, as they finish their dessert, Ruth leans in and whispers the trigger phrase in David's ear. "Sleepytime," she says, and David instantly falls into a trance.

Ruth grins and turns to their parents. "Mom, Dad, do you want to see something cool?" she asks.

David stands up, still in a trance, and begins to perform a series of strange movements, like a living statue. Their parents look on in amazement, not realizing what's really going on.

Jeannette watches from afar, feeling a twinge of guilt for what she's started. She knew that Ruth would take advantage of the hypnosis, but she had hoped that she would use it more responsibly.

As the lunch comes to an end, Ruth snaps her fingers, and David comes out of the trance, looking bewildered. He has no memory of what just happened, and it's clear that Ruth has erased any traces of their hypnotic episode from his mind.

Jeannette can't help but feel a sense of sadness as she watches David and Ruth leave. She knows that their relationship will never be the same again, and that she bears some of the responsibility for that.

As she cleans up the dishes, she resolves to be more careful with her hypnotic experiments in the future. She has seen firsthand the damage that can be caused when power falls into the wrong hands.
